1b1(rgyud): rgyag skad du/ Ar+yA badz+ra pA ti Ab+hi She ka ma d+hAHna/ bod skad du// 
1b2(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po// bam po dang po// sangs
1b3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
1b4(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen
1b5(rgyud): po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs
2a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par smras pa yod pa/ khung bzung
2a2(rgyud): chen po rin po che'i rgyal po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po// 
2a3(rgyud): nor bu chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par smras pa la bzhugs nas/ lAm me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi
2a4(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam thad pa'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad ma'i snying po'i skye
2a5(rgyud): ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i chog pa chen pos kun nas bskor te sems kyi
2a6(rgyud): dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang gsung dang thugs
2b1(rgyud): seM nyams cad dngan bral ning kun gyis grub par sangs nam gyi mdzad pa la 'gyu nga/ 'dis ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes kyi mtshos kyinam grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa nyid kyigam
2b2(rgyud): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ lus
2b3(rgyud): dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
2b4(rgyud): snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang
2b5(rgyud): ngag dang yid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag/ me tog
2b6(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dum nges par ston pa 'di na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa bsgrub pa dang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
2b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi so// mdor
2b8(rgyud): can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po
3a1(rgyud): sbyin pa dang ldan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang dron 'thun pa pa 'phrub pa sha sngags/ de dag ni tu de nyid dang dmig pa bde dag nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do// de ltar na
3a2(rgyud): chugs ma dpa'adri dag bcom ldan 'das rnam pa sna mdza rje mi shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams cad mtho ba ni 'jug ste// rnam papa na ba sems ste/ dge chen mo mngon par 'du rje
3a3(rgyud): / yang rgyu de nyid dang dmig pa pa de nyid kyis so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur cing / ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// praHde
3a4(rgyud): par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par 'alta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ya mtshan gyis snying 'dun pa mkhyen napa/ 
3a5(rgyud): rgyu sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong brag dum nga mgur na pa byung ngo // de gA nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te/ 
3a6(rgyud): 'i khams rab 'byan dag dang 'dzin rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan
3a7(rgyud): nad bral bde// dbang ba skur rgyal po 'i bang pa ni// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na// snying 'thad chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pal// pad+ma'i snying po dang bzhugs nas// byang chub sems
3a8(rgyud): rnarnams kyis bskor// gnas der thub pa chen po yis// bkod pa chen por gang sprul pa// de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang // dbyings dang ba dog gang yin pa// de ni bskal pa grangs med du// bstan par nus
3b1(rgyud): ma yin no// de srid pa da'9/ rdzogapa sa sa sun ga // med gnyis nyi spangs shAg// de/ papa gcod cis// zhes phrul to// de nas pa pangar danan
3b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la baphrul nas skang log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su 'azhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzad sun pa yi
3b3(rgyud): nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dge par 'askul ba lakhor 'od zer pa rgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad du sangs rgyas pa
3b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de dgal 'dren pabacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzun pa/ bsgya' dang ni mcho pa bkyi ba da / sems can la phan pa pa zhid pa che mdzod bye/ khyed cag mas ca su nam 'di gshen
3b5(rgyud): ces yang dag par ston to// de nam 'od zer de dag yang sngar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag
3b6(rgyud): rang rang gi de bzhin gshegapa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par thang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
3b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la balba ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po bang sgyur gyi 'ang ba chen por mchi na/ rgyal po dang skur mi bang ba chen po ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig pa yis/ gang
3b8(rgyud): das la mangs min ga man na/  gyi ma canan gan du ga/ 
4a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi kha
4a2(rgyud): gyi skad mi tog keg zhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang mnu pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi lasas bya byas dus nges par ston pa dag yod de/ 'jig rten gyi rgyas rab byam 'i ngem par yon pa la
4a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de la mtsham pa sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
4a4(rgyud): khams sde 'a phrag brgyad da nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba brag brgya dang rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag 'aspyad khru ba dang nyi mi bye ba phrag brgya dag gang gis khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen
4a5(rgyud): / 'jig rten gyi khams so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi
4a6(rgyud): sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa gcig go// me tog ni gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su nu gas pa
4a7(rgyud): ma tog gi bzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod par rab 'byam kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rkyen bkod pa'i phyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams grang gi khongs du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs
4a8(rgyud): me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud par ma gcig go// 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas blar mI bko ngapa'i rgyu dbye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhug
4b1(rgyud): daM/ ma tog rgan stong po'i kun ma/  tsa'i 'jig rten gyi rnams bkod pa cig s+ho// donamam ldan 'das rnam par snang ma da dpa/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyang ba po// 
4b2(rgyud): kyi budag 'jig rten gyi khams den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de nyid/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do nyid yin te/ sngon kyi smon las kyi dab
4b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor// lus dang ngag dang yin gyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams par meden rgyal po
4b4(rgyud): dbang myur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do ni de 'dra ste/ de'i yon tan nas spyod pa'am smon lam ma ma ye shes kyi mtha'i ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang
4b5(rgyud): tortogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag ded kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur na / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa bzo ba byas pa shes pa
4b6(rgyud): lhag go// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' dun tu bzang po la sngon mi spyod pa dang smon lam dang ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsam sa te/ bstan pa kam
4b7(rgyud): par mdzad pa dang theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ci tsam du byang chub sem pa dpa' kun du bzang po byin gyis bad+ma
4b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mas brtsams te/ rag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byam go bar mdzad par bzhed nas/ 'od zer gyi dra chen po 'di byung ngo // der
5a1(rgyud): shar phyags na da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya rin chan tog gas byang chub sems dpa' yin chen blo gro la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying
5a2(rgyud): sbyi nonams ma na ta mra khe b+h+yaHsarbata DAka te b+h+yaSh+Thab tsan+ta dan/ rigs kyi bu khyod chen po che chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i
5a3(rgyud): thos kyi snying po 'di blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnab par ma
5a4(rgyud): bzod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen podang / rin po tshod rjechen po'i snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gis
5a5(rgyud): me po rgyan pa kong byagal ba dang / rgyal po dab sgyur gyi khang pa gal bder song sa phyin napa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang hrul pong nga baSh+T+ri gyi yang pachen po yang rin po ched rnaMng
5a6(rgyud): ke sprin chen pos mngon par bka' bo// de bzhin du bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / blag pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dag rgyan dang / 
5a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba de yang song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la
5a8(rgyud): brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'od ba bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po chedang rdo rje'i khang pa 'tshegs pa chen po dang rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang pad+ma'i 'i
5b1(rgyud): seng ge'e wa chen po dang mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che rdo chen pa'i snying pos byin gyis bablangs te/ rin po tsho rdo rje chen po'i mi ge'i snying po'i ya ge'i mang pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing bzhugs
5b2(rgyud): po phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i da'ang bos// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rdo rje
5b3(rgyud): snying po'i snying pos byin gyi pa brlabs nas bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bgad pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang blta ba dang / 
5b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyang song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun du chu bri rgyal po'i dbang pos// rdo chen po'i snying po di gsungs so// na
5b5(rgyud): man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa na ma ma hA badz+ra grA pa ra~M hU~M/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob capa bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye la khrag
5b6(rgyud): tu stong phrag du la sa yongs su bskor cing mdun du bder te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang ldan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi
5b7(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang rgyal po dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'dab ga la ba der song nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad rin
5b8(rgyud): rjem chog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so// rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang 'dug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / thug pa dang phye ma dang / na 'ja' dang gdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan nas pa dang
6a1(rgyud): chen pa ma cho gdung / rin pa rgya mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dang sgrar gyi khang pa chen po snang bar byas so//  na chen phyir / mchog ga sgras phyogs
6a2(rgyud): byas so// go bor byas nas kyang de ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lto phyogs nyid du gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po de dag dang /  cig kyi chen po'i mtshig la ba tsung ba'i ba
6a3(rgyud): chen po rnams la 'dug go// nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6a4(rgyud): spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog/ rdo chen po'i bad+ma'i mchoga'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
6a5(rgyud): / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ rdo chen po'i pad+ma mchog gi dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// nam ca
6a6(rgyud): \u0f7fsarbata thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba bA ka ru Na ba la badz+ra pa d+yA gras/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub
6a7(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rkyen bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par
6a8(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'gas pa spyan ra/ 
6b1(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye' khrug drug brgya stong phrag ma yong na bdun du dang // 'jig tan kyi khams den mi snang ba snga ra nas/ 
6b2(rgyud): chen po de dag dang sbyin cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byin nas/ rgyal ba dbang sar gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mam pa
6b3(rgyud): skor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje'i rgyal po la 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams me tog
6b4(rgyud): po'i rkyen bkod pa thams cad du thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi sprin nams kyis kun du bkang nas sdang bar byas so// byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das
6b5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugapa pas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i snying po la/ rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnod pa rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi si
6b6(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa mi 'khrugs pa pa/ byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog
6b7(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+t+ra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarbapra par dman dgri gri/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po sa rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi ga
6b8(rgyud): snying po'i rkyen bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba der/ bcom ldan 'dab rnam par sna 'ayang du de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btad do// de nas byang chu
7a1(rgyud): dpa' ba'i snying po'i'ajig rten gyi khams den pa mi spang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byeg khrag grag brgya thug dums yongs su mnar cing sa nar cing mdun du bdang te/ byang
7a2(rgyud): / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kau gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan 'akod pag la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal
7a3(rgyud): bdeng song ste byin nus/ bcom ldan 'dasal lan ba rgya stong du mar skor bar byas te/ ji sa yos pa bzhin du byang phyogs nyid duganas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rkyen bkod par byin gyis rgyal te/ 
7a4(rgyud): ba kyi snying po'i mchog gi lus kyis smin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham sa sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa pa'i
7a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin po me mchog 'dzin gyis byang chub sem pa dga' don po che tshod ldan la/ dkon mchog gdu mtho rdo rje 'byung gnas de/ chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldar 'das de
7a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs snapa rin po mamachog 'dzin gyis/ dkon mche ga gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi stong po 'di gsungs so// napa byas man mu sa
7a7(rgyud): sa thAg te b+h+yaHpa mang gi/ 'di byin na pa rigs kyi na gyi khams ma dag zhanan da na padod pa da/ rgyal ba nga shA kyil ba chen po / cos lan
7a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i byed yang shig ce ba 'ang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dzin chom na/ mtsham ldan 'das sa gnang bab 'jig rten gyi khams da
7b1(rgyud): / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya skyong du mas yongs su bstor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dadag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog na
7b2(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po da'ang skur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ka la ba der song nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
7b3(rgyud): nyid du gnas nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rjes brgyan po'i pad+ma'i rgyal po la 'jug ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi grwa'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad rgyas par 'ges so// 
7b4(rgyud): 'i phyogs mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyab sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' srin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje
7b5(rgyud): bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de ras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis
7b6(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa rba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta nA ga te b+h+yaHsarba tha ma hA badz+ra me g+he bi kri ta ti bi shwa sa ma b+hu ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun 'akod pade
7b7(rgyud): dang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo // den pa byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de na
7b8(rgyud): le snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'ad te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das
8a1(rgyud): lab deng seng nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bsdu sbed du mar ba rkang ba byas //  ba shan du/  tu la phyags ma mam pa nyid dugan nas sud ldan med rjem gan
8a2(rgyud): kye rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi/ khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go/ lce nub
8a3(rgyud): phyogs mtshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo chen po'i tog byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpal bol rdo rje las thung ba'i snyi
8a4(rgyud): par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs mas derje'i tog gis/ de chen po la 'byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsam
8a5(rgyud): byaHswA rbata thAg tub+h+yaHsarbathA bad+d+hod+hAShe \u0f7f/ 'dri ban nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' do dpa' bo// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
8a6(rgyud): grag khrig pa rgya steng phrag du las yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rtsa
8a7(rgyud): bkod pa gas pa dang rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gal ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji mar
8a8(rgyud): bzhen sa phyog ma nyid dgas das/ de na ma thu ldanamacan das kyi 'a na kyil semams cad rgya yar 'gas shes dngags
8b1(rgyud): can pa'i de chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas byang chu
8b2(rgyud): sems dpa' 'brug sa'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs sbags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra
8b3(rgyud): nadu nabs/ dnga'i yiga'i snying po'i di gsungs so// na maHsa mu khe b+h+yahA porba ta nA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bA badz+ra rak+Sha rin 'i kAn tA swA ta/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da
8b4(rgyud): napo 'brug sgra'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das des gnang ba sa/ 'jig rten gyi kham pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dang
8b5(rgyud): byang chub sem pa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i tAn bkod pa gal ba dang rgyal po dbang phyur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan
8b6(rgyud): ma par snang mdzad gal 'a der spong nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du na babyang 'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te/ dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pa pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di tham sa cad go bar byed cing / 
8b7(rgyud): smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go/ 'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya ma rin po
8b8(rgyud): pa dag pa'i sbyi la// byang chub samamadapa' ba yan mag sa rjod patshan can rkye mo ba zhing po din9// na la ga sa panan hA/ 
9a1(rgyud): btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das de ba gnang nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sdang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byag
9a2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ki gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga
9a3(rgyud): der/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom
9a4(rgyud): 'das la lan brgya stong du mam bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pabartsegs pa sna tshogs pa dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa
9a5(rgyud): jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'greng ba shing / pad+ma'i rgyal po rdul dang dral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go// steng gi phyogs nus bcom ldan 'dab de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
9a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi skabs kyi snying po smin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
9a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po'i di gsungs so// na maHsa na su khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsachen po drug dang rma swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang // de nas byang chub sems dang
9a8(rgyud): gsul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das des gnang ba ba 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur ras/ byang chub sems dpa' brel khrag khrigs slong khrag dum sa yongs sa
9b1(rgyud): mdun du 'dar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi kham
9b2(rgyud): da/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyang rnam par snang ma da / ka/ la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong dri bar bskor ba byas te
9b3(rgyud): 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pago bar byed pa'i smonas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing // chos nyid pa
9b4(rgyud): 'dra chen po la 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing / 'khod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi ning gi
9b5(rgyud): tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / nam mkha' lngar gdod ma na sa'i
9b6(rgyud): dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du sur te// skadagacig tu tshigs pa bcad pa pa de dag smras so// 
9b7(rgyud): mas pa mangs 'o// yod dupa ni 'i skyes pa// mgo po tsha bu dam pa 'di// ci ska pal snang shig su// sums sri ma ma
9b8(rgyud): mtshan dang ldan// shin tu dag pa'i shes dang 'dra// sku yi sa sems can thams cad la// sangs rgyas ma ngan pa rnamapa mdzad kyang // skul 'gyur la mi mang 'a ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'// gang
10a1(rgyud): ni brag ca 'dra bas// bstan du med cing gzugs med byung // la ya chen ci bzhin du // 'gra thams cad rnam par mang/ mug pa ni rlom sems bral ba sa// dal
10a2(rgyud): mnga' ma lags// yul rnams dang ni de bral yad// sems can rnams ni yul du gyur// gsung ni de cinan sems can de// de bzhin su dang de badzin zhugs// mtshan nyid gcig dang rag ldan ring / 
10a3(rgyud): bzhin nga na mchog tu snang // skye ba med la grol ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa yod man pas// gang dag skye ba med shes pa// de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes// mgon pa dag tu mnyam bzhag
10a4(rgyud): lul dang ngag dang yi dpral ya // rtag par lus dag spyod yul te// thub brgyan durab tu sdang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin tu dka' 'a byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye she che 'bar / 
10a5(rgyud): 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed// de bzhin mig ni mi snang zhing // na 'a dang ni sna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni// de pyir de yi yul ma yin// gzug sa min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang dod nga reg
10a6(rgyud): bang po ma yin rnam she yin// thams cad du ni rtag tu'i// u.AHna d+ha ni yul dadag/ rnam pa brtags pas yi ma yin// yul can yod pa ma yin pa sa// yul rnam pa srid pa ma yin no/ 
10a7(rgyud): btags tshul du'o// de ni kun du thams cad mi// bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzadapa// ston pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar// kun gyi mdu na bzhugs pa yin// byis pasang ltar brtags pa bzhi
10a8(rgyud): snga ga tshe yod min pa// de mngon po yod 'gyur te// gzugs pa na 'byu ba'i tshul gyi su// ting 'dzid dbang sgyur rnams pani// sa sgra 'phel gtam thams cad kyis// kun gyi
10b1(rgyud): sa su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas// de na kun gyis ti 'dzin dang // gzung ba dang ngag dang rnam par thar// bsam kyis ma khyab thams cad thog/ gzungs la dbang niny+tsa
10b2(rgyud): cing // sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa// bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang // phyogs btu dag nas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs// de ni gzungs kyi mchog
10b3(rgyud): te/ yang dag rdzogs sangs yang dag par// de ni bdag cag thob par shoka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi
10b4(rgyud): mtha' med pa dang // de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gang yin pa la 'jug go// de ci'i phyir zhen
10b5(rgyud): ngatshad yongs su shes pas sras kyi sngon khri mtha' dang pyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// de bzhin du nga ba nyid yongs su shes pas dag dang yid kyi sngon pa mtha' dang bri ma'i mtha' mi dmigs s+ho/ 
10b6(rgyud): dro dbang bsrung 'i kyi 'a ma las gleng gi zhi'i / dang so'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkyu com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mad kyis
10b7(rgyud): sems dpa' phyogs 'dra'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sbyar gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nges
10b8(rgyud): gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sangs kyis kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ skad cig tha kyi
11a1(rgyud): yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' bar du// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad 'byin gyir rlob pa'o zhing nge 'dzin/ rnam par snang ba
11a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi kham
11a3(rgyud): 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamasems cad dang 'jig rten gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bkad pa thams cad dang / 'jig tan gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rmi
11a4(rgyud): thams cad dang / stang thams cad dang / steng gnyis pa thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po tham ba cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la
11a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang 'dod pa sna chags dang / 
11a6(rgyud): theg pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang sems can sna tshogs dag
11a7(rgyud): lasgra dang tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par
11a8(rgyud): cing/ rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'a khor las byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs pasod pa'i rkyen gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi/ byang chub sem mdapa' ses pa
11b1(rgyud): dpa' man po kun du babang pos yang dgra par rgyan gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rjed kyis la jo chen ca na me bu dang / bstan pa gnas pa byang dang / sangs rgyab kyi mdzadus gciganas gci ga tu chu ba rgyan
11b2(rgyud): 'chad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskung ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'ges
11b3(rgyud): pa'i snang ba dang / theg chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngag pa rnam par dag pa'i gos do/ dril po ba drug chen po'i dkyil 'khor dul gan rdo rje dpang chen po bsrung ba mad pa mthong ngo // de lung bcom ldan
11b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad smos pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du smos pa med pa'o// rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de na nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdod ma nas dag pa'i
11b5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'ang
11b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa yid bzhin gyi nong bu rin po che dang la
11b7(rgyud): sam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su 'thun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa/ nor
11b8(rgyud): na nas chen panas ngas can gyis kris pas bu 'de bu'i len pa ci zhig cem sems ca rnams kyi tshigs sem ca dag gyung // yang tho nam dgas
12a1(rgyud): stsal sa nga na rgya na ma rkyen mo sa dbyes pa nga na/ 
12a2(rgyud): tun tshigasas mams mas ched chogs mas cad kyi dun kyi ma
12b1(rgyud): da srung bas byung chub rnam sa drang 'thun du bzung ba dbang bsrung nas da nyid la bstan pa gtad do// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil la ba chen po las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bslab pa'i ga
12b2(rgyud): tshul 'byung ba'i zhes bya ba'i le'u sde gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po// ma po gnyis pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa du sa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
12b3(rgyud): chen po dpal yon tan gyi 'byung gnas na/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pas byin gyis brlabs
12b4(rgyud): dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa sems kyi dbang thams
12b5(rgyud): ma pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha sngag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dung tshe dang ldan pa ba yang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dpung chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyin krung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
12b6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa maud dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sge gcan 'dzin dang tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags par
12b7(rgyud): tshe dang ldanra pa ka ben chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga la 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan 'tshams chen dang / tshe dang ldan
12b8(rgyud): gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu dor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len pa bar dwa dza dang / me dpal
13a1(rgyud): srung srong dbang ba'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ni skyer dang / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam bran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag
13a2(rgyud): sogs pa dge slong khri nyos snang lnga brgya dang thabs cig go// byang chub sems dpa'i grogs rkyen cig stag la 'dis ste/ 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / drab can gyi 'od gnon nur
13a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya
13a4(rgyud): che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson par chos la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad pa
13a5(rgyud): ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo grob rab tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsamapas pa na byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' snyan/ 
13a6(rgyud): / dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mabu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' slob kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' pa'i rmyi
13a7(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang grub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sem pa dpa' blo gros
13a8(rgyud): med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
13b1(rgyud): sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi
13b2(rgyud): shing bcu'i dul tharas kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / 'gyis cig sa de dag thams ca kyang pa dang pha rol tu phyid pa dang / gzung ba dang / spobs dung
13b3(rgyud): dbang thob pa sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa bsam paci lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byedapa/ 
13b4(rgyud): sngon gyi smon lam ci lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas
13b5(rgyud): sha staka ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ 
13b6(rgyud): drang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ shin tu lham me ldan ne lgang ngo // gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs yang tshangs
13b7(rgyud): ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur te// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgyu stong phyag dums yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te de nyid du 'dus nas bdun
13b8(rgyud): par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang por ba sim dang / thal bzang rib dang shing mchog dang bti dang / je chen dang dus kyi 'khor la can dang dri ma med pa dang / tog dang zla gdod dang rnam par 'jom sa dang / 
14a1(rgyud): zab mo dang stobs can dang sgrag can dang / tog dregs dang rnam par snang ba dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshogs phreng ba can dang de dag la sogs pa dang / lA ma yin gyi dbang pogs
14a2(rgyud): stong dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad dngangang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lce ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / l+h+wa ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang bdug pa dang / byug
14a3(rgyud): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rkyen dang sil sran dang reg do'i rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
14a4(rgyud): sdug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kyai thub pa gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ci ltar stsal ba'i me tog da
14a5(rgyud): dug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang thug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang badran dang rgan dang sil snyan dang pheg dob rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to// 
14a6(rgyud): das kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po pa dris pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'ang zer brgya pa dang klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang / klu'i rgyal
14a7(rgyud): rin po che'i cod pan can dang klu'i rgyal po bajog po dang / klu'i rgyal po sa ga ma med dang klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyis rgyu dang klu'i rgyal po ni dum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma rnam
14a8(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po ba d+ma chen po dngad thu'i rgyam po du can dang / kwa'e rgyal po rigs can dang klu'i rgyal po mag gcig pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po brdzun po dang klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i
14b1(rgyud): dang / klu'i rgyal po stob pa ldan dang de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan dan gor shi sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas
14b2(rgyud): shi la snga tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bgad bya'i nags tshul phrag po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la~M bder song ste/ gnyis nas ni ltar sprul pa'i rnam chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing bral sna tshigs kyi
14b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bko dpa' rags tshal stug por char du mngon par phab po// pab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnamadzes kyi
14b4(rgyud): nod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / gnod
14b5(rgyud): mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang ba 'azang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mongs byed 'dzin nu'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin ci sde
14b6(rgyud): chen po la ga pa brgya pa dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas chen dang de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng bang
14b7(rgyud): byug pa dang byes dang na bza' dang ga dug sa dang rgyal mtshan drang ba dan dang sil snyan rnams thogs nas/ gi la sdig kyi rgyas pacan shod medas kyi la dru yo sa das kyi ldan 'das ka la ba de
14b8(rgyud): lpags nas/ ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang zag pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// ga
15a1(rgyud): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal phyogs gcig tul 'od// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khar mi 'ama'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang b+h+ya
15a2(rgyud): pa dang phye ma dang na 'da' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang pil snyad dang pheg rdob pa rnam pa du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ shing sa la sna tshogs
15a3(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang 'dug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza'ang
15a4(rgyud): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang 'drin dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nam sa
15a5(rgyud): ldesteng gi dbang po rnam par 'dud byed kyi bu dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jig 'gro dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'dab brkyang dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug 'ung
15a6(rgyud): brgya stong dus dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste lhagasanA/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo'i bdag po khros bzhin dang srin
15a7(rgyud): po mche ba bzang dang / srin mo'i bdag po drag po dang rab gtum dang 'jigs 'jigs lha dang / spag byed dang 'jigs byed chen po dang gdong bcu dang gshin rje dang gshin je'i dril bu dang rnam par
15a8(rgyud): 'jig sa 'jigs su dang / zla ba'i spel khor srin po dum dang ldan pa dag kyang ging sngal ga tshogs kyi rgyal ba can bkod pa'i nags tshal sug yogal ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal brna
15b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mag pas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po mya la bar drang srong du ba dang ldan pa yang shing shA la mA tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags la
15b2(rgyud): po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal 'dor song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig stsa la med do// rlung ljid kyi phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jig byed dang
15b3(rgyud): drung chags byed dang / rlung kun du 'jog byed dang / rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang rlung rlung dmar dang rlung 'jig rten 'dzin dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der do
15b4(rgyud): ka nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong dum dang ldan pa yang shing sA la chen po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i dag
15b5(rgyud): la stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal 'drer song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed
15b6(rgyud): skam sa byed dang dub 'byin dang dab 'a bar dang / nyim phred byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brda 'phangs pa brgya stong dus dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags chal stug po ga la
15b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gal bdir song ste phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po mu lA 'khor klu'i rgyal po dum dang ldan pa yang shis
15b8(rgyud): la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan 'akod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der bang sa byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi na pas la mgo 'os phyig 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug mo
16a1(rgyud): khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nag pa tshal sdug po ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang pong ste phyin nas
16a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo thos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// drug po ye dgas kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das gal 'a der song sa byin nas bcom ldan 'das la rgya
16a3(rgyud): 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la
16a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nab pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gza'i rgyal po chen po sprin drug gi bu 'khor bza' brgya s+ho
16a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal snag po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngos phyag 'a
16a6(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'dug gi/ sprin lha'i bu sku bo zhes bya ba dang sprin lha'i bu klo'i phreng zhes bya ba dang sbed lha'i bu drab srug po 'joms byed ce bya ba dang sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lngang
16a7(rgyud): brgya stong du sa dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sAl sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan 'akod pa'i nags tshal phug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
16a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// glegasug byed ces bya ba dang gleg gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog sdug 'od ces bya ba dang glog 'od ces bya ba dang glog medzes phreng can zhes bya ba 'khor to/ 
16b1(rgyud): brgya steng dus dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sAl snga tshogs kyinal man bzhod pa nags chal phrug pogal ba dang / ma ldan 'das gal ba deng sangs ldan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
16b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ri'i rgyal po re re ba dang ri'i rgyal po spos kyi dang ldang dang ri'i rgyal po gangs de dang ri'i rgyal po'i rigs byed dang/ ri'i rgyal po mal la de ri'i rgyal po dpa
16b3(rgyud): 'i rgyal po le mjed can dang ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang ri'i rgyal po rig sngags 'chang dang/ ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag kyang shing sA la rdzogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa
16b4(rgyud): tshul phug po ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal ba dar pong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu la yod do// gshin rje dang mtshan mo nag mo dang btson na
16b5(rgyud): pocan dang skyes bu nag po dang 'chi bdag dang dpal byin pa dang rna nag ma yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lha
16b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dka' thub zlog ma dang tsu ru b+ha dang drag po'i chung ma dang tshungs pa'i nang ma dang khyab 'jug gi chung dang gzhon nu
16b7(rgyud): dang lus den gyi chur ma dang phag gi rlung sa dang 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma dang shing sAl sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan pokod pa'i nags tshal sug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der sdong ste/ gas
16b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byin papa la ma na pos phyag 'a com te phyog pa gcig tulamed de//  krung chen po gdadang chu klung chen pos teng wa klung chen pod byang sa can dang / shu krung chen po ti spyod nga/ mu rlung
17a1(rgyud): chen po zla ba'i man+dan dang mu klung chen po ya kun na dang mu klu chen po kun rdzib shes gnyen dang chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho snyen dang mu klung chen po bgrang sman
17a2(rgyud): mchog ldan dang chu klung chen po brtse ba sbyin yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
17a3(rgyud): zhabapa la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dri za'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng ba can dang dri zla'i rgyal po 'phrog bo dang dri ba'i rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnod pa
17a4(rgyud): deze'i rgyal po tu skyes dang / dri zab rgyal po ut+pal lta bu'i mig dang dri ba'i rgyal po tsan dan brtsegs kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nagra tshal stug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das
17a5(rgyud): la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye
17a6(rgyud): tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rab gtum dang rig sngags 'chang gi rtul po bsnyems ldan dang rig sngags 'chang ge rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / reg sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde
17a7(rgyud): reg sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang gzhan yang 'khor rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po
17a8(rgyud): pas dang / bcom ldan 'das gal te der song ste lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nab pa la mag pos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo mo can zhes bya ba dang srin po ga yengs
17b1(rgyud): snyed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mohU~M zhes bya ba dang / srin po 'tshal ma zhes bya ba dang srin mo rmongs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo nod ma zhes bya ba dang / sran ma dajal bu'i lha nas bya ba dang bran
17b2(rgyud): sdom nes bya ba dang / phrin mo zangs 'dab ni zhes bya ba dang / sring mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo phun tsa le zhes bya ba dang srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba dang srin mo 'dzugs su rung ma zhes bya bang
17b3(rgyud): me ni ma lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen med dag dang kawAn yang srin mo 'khor dram dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mchen ba shod pa'i nags tshal smug po kA
17b4(rgyud): ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i rgyal po mdung can dang 'byung po'i rgyal po
17b5(rgyud): gshol can dang 'byung po'i rgyal po gtun shing can dang 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang 'byung ba'i rgyal po 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung
17b6(rgyud): poganya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya skyong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshul stug bo gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags na
17b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang
17b8(rgyud): be dgas thams cad dang bdud thams cad dang 'dun gyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / de dag thams cad shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nag
18a1(rgyud): tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
18a2(rgyud): bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs ba zhi nas lhags te gcig tu 'drab nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
18a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin tu yangs shing tha gru che la ka tsa lin dka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cig/ sa gzhi rdo rje dang
18a4(rgyud): dang spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba/ dos gnyis ka'i sgo khang dang rta babs dang skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes par byas pa steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ 
18a5(rgyud): gi do sha la mang po dbyangs pa dang gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pa sil snyan dang pheg rdob pasnyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i skra 'byin pa/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang ku mu ta dang pad+ma dkar po dang du mchog gis
18a6(rgyud): phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'arlabapa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad
18a7(rgyud): na po'i 'khor lug gi ris bskor ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khyams su gyur pa chu zheng dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa dus thams cad pa'i me tog ki legs par brgyan pa/ 
18a8(rgyud): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs tsha yongs su gang ba byang chub sems dpa' las kyis byung ba ste dper na gzhad 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las kyis byung ba
18b1(rgyud): lung nge gnas pa de bzhin du shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po yang / bcom ldan 'das rgya mthus ldan der rnam par mdzes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma
18b3(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste/ rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// rdo rje 'byung gnas
18b4(rgyud): // shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// rdo rje slob pa chen bsrung bar gyis// na maHpa tathA gA te b+h+yaHbarba mA khe b+h+yaHswA hA/ rdo 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i ma
18b5(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdo rje'i 'byung gnas kyi snying po sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grag par gyur te/ 
18b6(rgyud): 'byung kan sa dpa' yin// sems can na la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlob sa// rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang // snying po 'di ni
18b7(rgyud): klur cig/ des na 'dir ni de dag kun// tshul chen dngos grub thab par shog/ ces grag pa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu'apas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ 
18b8(rgyud): bzang po dang byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bar 'phrul la/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi byang chub semasapa
19a1(rgyud): spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgrol 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pag par sngags kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'dra
19a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes yong dge par spyod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
19a3(rgyud): bu 'phral du 'bras bu mang 'a byang chub sems dpa'igs chen byang chub sems dpa' legs par brjod pa byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i sbrums rnam par rol pa
19a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyid mtshig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur la lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub
19a5(rgyud): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ni ma gtogs te rngo
19a6(rgyud): 'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang thams cad dang ldan/ 
19a7(rgyud): / 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'di ni dus lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni ched lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sdod kyi spyong pa yang dag par sbyor pa ba
19a8(rgyud): zheso zhes byaba'i nyi 'a'adum thoms la jug nami thon gyi stong pa rnam pa 'dag pa'i da chen po'i 'byung gnas gas sngags kyi rgyal ba 'dig su yi// namathas su la gyus pa
19b1(rgyud): gti b+h+yaHsarba rbA khe/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dngo mtshar du gyung ba'i snying gas ma lda gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes kyi
19b2(rgyud): bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pa// kun kyang de'i dbang du byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las
19b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // de phrang nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs so// 
19b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i kun bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon
19b5(rgyud): spyod pa ston pa smon lam btab nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung steng bus kyi 'dzam bu'i gling mi mjed 'dir ljang lo can du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phrog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa
19b6(rgyud): 'od zer gyi snang ba des snang bar gyur nas/ mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsom gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer bar 'dug
19b7(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i brda mdzad de tshigs su bcad pa yang 'di gsungs so// sems can dag pa zla bzhin
19b8(rgyud): gshegs shing // de bzhin gshegs pa pa byen brlabs byang chub gnol// bsam las mag mi nyid legs rtog pa kho chu pyod// rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gso bshon mi// nga zag
20a1(rgyud): mnyam myed la dag gam pa// du ma pa sa 'a na chog zung // phyogs bcu dganas sa rgya skyed ga// sems na don ma dumamam las gzugs
20a2(rgyud): banga' ba// de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod// gsang ba'i bdag pa sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems cani snying po tshur// gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang
20a3(rgyud): shog cig/ brtan te srung las skyes pa'o// dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig/ dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig/ dma' sbyin byed chur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa// 
20a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che// rdo rje lta bur tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras pa 'jigs med pa// sems can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog/ rtag
20a5(rgyud): phred pa gsum de yi// snying dga' byed pa tshur shogacig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa/ 
20a6(rgyud): shog cig/ kun du mdzes pa tshur shogacig/ srid gsus dbang phyug zur shog cig/ khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan// glang po napa khyod dur shog/ su tshogs gzugs can lda
20a7(rgyud): med khyod// mthong na dga' ba chur shog cig/ 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can chur// tshur shog nA dku ra ba// rtag tu sna tshogs gros phreng 'chang // cod pan mgul 'tshur shog cig/ mi
20a8(rgyud): thob pa tshur shog cig/ 'jig pa 'jig patshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// phyi shol ma byed tshur shog cig/ de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i
20b1(rgyud): dka gsungs nas 'ongs pal 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba nA a bi s+yA ye be shar r+ya mya le b+ha ga pa te badz+ra a mtshan
20b2(rgyud): la~M ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rigasugs kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cing mi gsung byer 'azhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sdug
20b3(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs pa dag tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag
20b4(rgyud): ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' ldi nga
20b5(rgyud): mi 'as me dang lho 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba stong phrag dums yongs su bstor cing mdun du bdar te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkrod pa'i nags tshal sug po ka la bad
20b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pa bzhugs pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo // de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang gdod sbyin gsodas
20b7(rgyud): rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dong bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang thams cad dpa
20b8(rgyud): pa'i 'khor de la yang blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i blang du/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags chel sug po ga la ba der bzhud do// de nas byang chub
21a1(rgyud): sems dpa' kun du bzang po de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa smon pa la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' kun du/ 
21a2(rgyud): bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
21a3(rgyud): yangs shing rgya che ba nor buchen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo khang dang rtab bapa dang stag bu dums brgyan pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser lngas shing sA la gcig pa lta bur byas pa
21a4(rgyud): rnam par sbas pa mtha' mthar phug ron pa bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byis pa mu tig ge sna gnyis ka'i drabs bris parin po che'i dril bug yer ka'i drabs seng gi bar sngang yongs su bskor ba lho das
21a5(rgyud): cos ma dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan dang pib rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol
21a6(rgyud): dz+nyAn par skal gdu zhu dang na cha gdub 'khor gyis btsun cing spyi'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang b.rin pon chen po'i na re kun du bris pas phyogs bcu rgya chen pos legs par smras pa/ 
21a7(rgyud): li di ka ltar reg na bde bdus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa lha'i rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng gis rnam par smras pa/ ngang pa dang gzhad dang ngur pa dang shang sha
21a8(rgyud): / natsho nga theg dang sa kyang nga sru ba zung dang bya'i tshigs sa skye 'byin pa dang gra'i mi tig u la dang gu su dang badra dgar po dang drim chog dang badrad da gas ga dang yan lags
21b1(rgyud): ldan pa'i rgyus gang ba 'dzid byang chub sems dpas yongs su spyad par bya ba lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog pa can dag gla kun nas mdzes par byas pa rtag tu rkun mi 'chud par khang pa bas
21b2(rgyud): der lha'i me tog man dAng ba dang pa ru sha ka dang pa ru sha ka chen po dang sa brdol dang sa brdo 'i chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/ a ga ru nag pa'i 'dug pa'i sprin mang pos khebs par rnam
21b3(rgyud): par mdzes par byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis so so'i gnas bsal pa ci lnga ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa de dag mngon par sprul te/ 
21b4(rgyud): khang babartsegs pa de dag re rer yang rin po che'i dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug/ rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyad par bya ba sems
21b5(rgyud): car tham pa cad kyis mam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor burin po che chen po dgu bstod do// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyun bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sal mo cad gdug pa dang rgyal ma ma
21b6(rgyud): dang ba dan bsgreng bas mdzes par byas so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu yang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang baiDUr+ya chen po gapal ba'i rang
21b7(rgyud): nAn te/ 'di la ste dper na shin tu byis pa'i me long ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par sna mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa btsogs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gosal ba ste bai DUr+yags la
21b8(rgyud): phyir der spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham pa sems cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo // dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sde
22a1(rgyud): pa che'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to// sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang ba brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu 'ab bar mngon par snga
22a2(rgyud): te'adi ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par
22a3(rgyud): sprul pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
22a4(rgyud): pos yongs su bskod cing mdun du 'dang nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'jal chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas blangs te sreng gi bar snang la/ 
22a5(rgyud): bas te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya ba
22a6(rgyud): la ba der song ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi sngal mtshan bkod pa'i dgras stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par snang bar ga 'das gang dag 'ar
22a7(rgyud): / 'dus shing 'khor ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang blo 'phye chen po dang yi dang me ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang steng ge bar snang la
22a8(rgyud): dpag ched 'bul phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba'i nyi ya stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun
22b1(rgyud): na ma ya pa gyu//  chub sems dnga' ma pa dpang chen po ga ga ga sa nga ma sa na pa pa de dag sus kyang rnam par bsgyu na pa
22b2(rgyud): chen po ltar 'bar bti sho gas me rnam par mdzes par mthong napa de dag kyang la mtshan du gyur pa'i spyong kris bcom ldan 'dab de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mangs
22b3(rgyud): sa/  pa zhupapa/ ma lan 'das 'di nas ca bum thag drug rtsi ba rgyad cig gi par shA la snyam ma ldan na byung de ga zhing bcom ldan 'das rtags par dka'
22b4(rgyud): pa dkA' ba 'din kyi lags de gang ces gso pa bdang / bcom ldan 'das de banan gi shegs pa dgra tshol pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAk+Sha thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa 'di dag
22b5(rgyud): dang lnga'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba de la bal ba dang phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang
22b6(rgyud): ngos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mad kyi rgya bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang ba brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa de bzhin gsheg pa pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i
22b7(rgyud): bskal sngon gyi spyod pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa sa di nachos ga ge yon tan bskal pa brgyar yangal ba 'jog pa par mi nus pa de'i 'od lus me lan ni lung nger 'jug pa'o// byang chum sems dpa'
22b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun du bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i smon la pang dag pa'i gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun du 'dri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig gi lan 'di bka' stsa
23a1(rgyud): cag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa
23a2(rgyud): tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te char du phab nas te
23a3(rgyud): ginam mkha' las babus te khang ba brtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas// rnam dgra
23a4(rgyud): 'dul zhugs bzang po pa// rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa// phyag 'tshal sems can dag khyod la// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sna dang de bzhin lce dang ni// lus dang de bzhin yid kyis ni/ 
23a5(rgyud): ba'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ngo // reg bya yul can 'tshal pa yi// dngos po kun las rnam grol ba// rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gdod nas
23a6(rgyud): skyes pa// su gsung thugs la sogs pa yis// gzugs bad+mar lta bur 'jig rten du// mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu dga'// khyod ni sems can srog mo lags// gang zag kun ga'i
23a7(rgyud): dam lags// dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung // ci ltar ma lags ci ma lags// khyod ni brtan nas byung bcom// sgyu ma lta bur dngos por spangs// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni// thugs
23a8(rgyud): khyed chung nang gnyis mchog/ khyi na ngan nyid kyis spong // stong ba nyid kyar mchisas lags// slong ma mi thong rnam thir grol// nam mkha' 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chubs
23b1(rgyud): dpa' sa dpalan ba kun dubangang pos ma ldan 'dapal mngon par 'arjod nas/ g.yon sa sa ma na ci ma ldan 'das ma panab rgya slong mar bapar ba byas te/ ma la 'das na
23b2(rgyud): sa khrug man mas la da lags no//  sa sa pa dgal sa ma
23b3(rgyud): swA ga ciganas gcig tu'ur zhes grag ste// gcod nas non mtshan nyid med/ sa nyid gcig tu dgu ba se// khyed cag ma dgas songs la// me ma'o 'di la che par gyis// theg pa chen po'i
23b4(rgyud): sngon kyi snod pargyun med// spyod pa'i rgyal po myed ce ba// kun gyis rin tu thob pa sa// sbyin kyi spyod pa rgya mtsha rnams// yongs su dag pa'i rgya yis na// rdul 'arnam par snang ma ni/ 
23b5(rgyud): ngos la ltos// ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la// gang du'ang spyod par mi gnas kyang // gang dag spyod pa rnams spangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang / 
23b6(rgyud): snang i// med bzhin lus dang yang// yang lags so// dang po gang pa'i tho pa'o// gang gi chen byangs gyur ba// de me bcom la rnam thong ma // nal 'bor can gyi
23b7(rgyud): ring bas lags nyim lags// nang dang byed ma legs te// rtagatan pa mkha' 'dang gnas ya/ na'abyung ban chen po snang // byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po kun chu ba zar
23b8(rgyud): chags su bcad 'dred ga zos ma thag tu stan las langs rmugs phrag pa gcig tug par dal zums g.yos pa'i lhang sil btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lags su la
24a1(rgyud): ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs
24a2(rgyud): bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig nu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
24a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ 
24a4(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la
24a5(rgyud): 'jug pa theg pa chen por 'jug pa nas bgyi ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig blad gas lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i bud pa ni ci lta bu zhig lags skyed pa de rtog par khong du chud pa'i su
24a6(rgyud): lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te sems can chen po legs so legs so// sems can
24a7(rgyud): popo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dra ba ni yang legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sa
24a8(rgyud): shad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu ga nas shes bya
24b1(rgyud): ni'o// da yang shing rjechen po sngon du 'gro ba'i rnyed pa sus mas can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nyeb bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gas do rnam pa pa'o// shA gzhan yang chag
24b2(rgyud): na po ni dam pa gnyis te 'dus byas kyi rab tu phye ba dang 'dus ma byas kyi sarabatu phra ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni smod pa'i ngo bo'o// 'dus mabyas kyis rab tu phye ba'i thag pa chen
24b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang stong pa nyid
24b4(rgyud): 'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spong pa'i ba'i theg pa chen po ga zhin stong pa nyid mngon du bas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang dus kyi dbang
24b5(rgyud): gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang na par bzung sa bya ba dang lus rjes kun du bslang ba tshul gyis 'dugs pa ste rigs kyi bu 'dini stong ba 'ang ba'i theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu de la 'du
24b6(rgyud): theg pa chen po nyid gang zhe na 'dri lta ste/ ci ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi cho ga bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu ci ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// 
24b7(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa de la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'o
24b8(rgyud): med do// gang la gdags pa' ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo yang med pa de la spyod pa med do// gang sa spyod pa med pa de brjo pa byab sa yin na// gang brjo bar bya ba ma yin pa dngos po thams
25a1(rgyud): / thal ba gagapa mamam da sa 'i 'khrug /  la gsas sa tshan tsha 'a da shegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzos
25a2(rgyud): s+ya sa rgyas pa bden pa'o// rigs kyi bden pa gang yin pa yong pa'o// yod pagang yin pa de rdzu ma yin pa'o// gang rdzun pa ma yin pa yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang yin
25a3(rgyud): chos nyid do// chos nyi gang yin pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pade legs so// ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
25a4(rgyud): shin nyid de// de bzhin nyid gang yid pa de btags pa'o// btags pa gang yin pa de rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzobases bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pa btags so// btags
25a5(rgyud): pa yo pa/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgrab ca pa yang dag par rdzogus pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigarten du 'byung brtson// sa sang bad zhi 'a sla par byed pa dag chos kyi 'khor la
25a6(rgyud): kau ba / yong myang na las 'das pa chen po la thugs pa'i ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba ga/ 'jig pa dang / bye ba dang / ga dang / ni bdang 'byor ba dang chu 'ji rten du na
25a7(rgyud): rigs papa la sogs pa sa da yul ci ba bar btsunas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bas/ bas gas kyi la rnams namamam sa yin / sa
25a8(rgyud): yang dag pa'i bul yin te theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'dul yul gcig yang dag par thob pa dmed pa'o// de ci byer zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog khathams cad dang bral ba'i byer ro// 
25b1(rgyud): shad na sar ba do nog danas pa la na ga tu nga mig/  ro//  dpa sang med bslab
25b2(rgyud): pa ma yin pa yang med do// 'dul ba yang med 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do// de la ni lus sam ngag gam yid kyi 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa mi dmigs so// de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya
25b3(rgyud): 'am sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am nyan thos zhes bya ba'am rang sangs rgyas shes pa pa'am chos shes bya ba'am dge 'dun zhes bya ba'am lba zhes bya ba'am klun
25b4(rgyud): bya ba 'am gnod sbyin zhes bya ba'am dri za dang lAm yid dang nab mkha' lding dang / yi'am ci dang / lce 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba'am med ces
25b5(rgyud): bsod nams shes bya'a'am bsod nams pa yin zhes bya ba'am/ 'khor bzhes bya ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba'am/ thar pa zhes pa pa med do// rigs kyi bu de la ni duH
25b6(rgyud): shes bya ba 'am chod ces bya ba'am skad cig ces bya ba 'am yud tsam zhes bya ba 'am thang gcig ces bya ba med do// de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba'am skar ma shes bya ba'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am me zhes bya ba 'am
25b7(rgyud): des bya 'am/ chu zhes bya ba'am/ sa zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyid po zhes bya ba'am/ dus chags des bya ba'am/ lo khAd 'khor zhes bya ba 'am/ zla ba zhes bya ba med do// 
25b8(rgyud): kyi bu de ltar na rtog pam btags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar ltung ba je snyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i btags pa'i sgo ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'byung zhing med
26a1(rgyud): mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta skye dper na/ nam
26a2(rgyud): gnyis pam skyes pa'i kyi rnams pa lemam sa na gnyis med pa'i/ gas kyi shin gyi nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o/ sa zhin du man ny-id kyang gi nyis su me pan/ 
26a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi smad ba skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a4(rgyud): dra 'chen po rnams su bstan to// de ci'i phyir na ni/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa'o// bslab pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa'o// thob pa med pa ni byang chu
26a5(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o// tsam bsred pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rol pa'o// 'dus pa ma yin pa de ni 'dul ba'o// gdags bu med pa ni 'dregs pa'o// mthong ba med pa
26a6(rgyud): desangs rgyas masong du'o// bsnyen bdur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// mi nyan pa cho nyan pa'o// nga drung pa med pa ni khe rjod pa'o// 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o// 
26a7(rgyud): med ni gnas pa'o// slong pa nyid mdzin pani me banyid do//  la nags pa med pa pa med pa mngon par dgas pa med pa myongan sum du byed pa med par
26a8(rgyud): dmas kyi su ma grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par byaste/ bya chum sems dpa' phel sa dba' chen pon spyo baspyad pa'o// gang du yang mi chags pa'o// gang du yang rjes su chags pas
26b1(rgyud): ka du yang khong khrob med pa'o gang du yang ni sdang med pa'o// de mi snang ma mongs phyin tsam po sapas ngag tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ rnam par mi rtog pa na ba legs par gnas pa zla med pa mig so
26b2(rgyud): rab tu mi g.yo ba sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi skyob dus gsum du yang sgyid lug pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams
26b3(rgyud): rdul lam du ba'am sprin gyi kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur skyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam l-i dra rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
26b4(rgyud): da pa 'di lta bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta phul gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rdo rje chen po dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan
26b5(rgyud): rkyen po tog gi spyod pa rdo/ chen po las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas pasod nams la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bzung bar bya ba klag par bya gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag pa
26b6(rgyud): // deg ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' semasna dzin pan ldan 'dul 'di ska ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngom cing to// bde ba ga shegs pa
26b7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang gan lam du grag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs pa rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang yid la bgyid 'dang / 
26b8(rgyud): smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po blan med pa de ba'i
27a1(rgyud): ba mngar bar rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul pa gnas pas ma gyis mkha' pa'i tshul la skal pa mchis pa lags so// bdag la zhugs partsa bar dag
27a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po blan med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsopa/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdorjechen po 'brang gnas zhes pa
