27a3(rgyud): ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par ga/ gas thag tu de das de'i mngal phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpa' bam thams cad du
27a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad rdo rngamar po'i sgra skegs te gsung gcig tu do chen po bar ba'i 'di 'phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i// denga'i 'byung gnasu rdo rje sems dpa'i yig
27a5(rgyud): gas kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i dgas tshal stug pe gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa gal ba der gshegs te byin nas rdo rje chen po pa dra'i gdan la sil mo
27a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub paganod bsrung ngam shes na gsol te/ nyam ba tu rjod pa yang dam skabs dang ldan nam
27a7(rgyud): nasas ma nas spyan gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de banan gshegs pa kyi com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs mas pa thub pa dang detsa'i de gshegs pa de dag
27a8(rgyud): dam dkyilal bar byed kyis dris pa'i rdo rjeg sa sal pa bdegs // nams sa la nyams sa shA ga \u0f7fsa rbes a ba drag pa cing/ de nas de bded
27b1(rgyud): pa de dag gis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas
27b2(rgyud): rnams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po dal mtshan che'i snyam du zhing 'dun pa gyur te 'angs dpal gzhon dur gyur ba la ba la zhing labod do// de nas 'jas dpal gnon dur gyur pas 'khor
27b3(rgyud): tshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham
27b4(rgyud): nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas// rnam par 'dren rnams mi gsung las// bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis// dbang bskur du/ 
27b5(rgyud): de nges par gda'// gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes te// theg pa chen po'i gro 'bang mchog/ der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / don kun grub pa'i spyod pa 'thob// gsang sngags spyad las byung
27b6(rgyud): ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad// kA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che// spyad pa yang dge bstan po
27b7(rgyud): gnas// sngon gyi snod las byung gyur pa// gsang sngags shes las byung bar bshad// gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de bzhin gang dag mabyon dang // mgon po gang dag pal
27b8(rgyud): rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs nas// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg pa chen pos dbang bskur 'di// bde gshegs sras la rab tu
28a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas drang srong chen pa pa// kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so// 'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol 'tshal// bstan pa kun la bsrung ba
28a2(rgyud): dam chos tag gnas pa ma sa dadu// bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsugatu// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur stsal// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// the'u chen tegs par khod du chud// 
28a3(rgyud): smon la mangs byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags tshon lags// thog ma'i spyod dran nges pa 'di// sangs rgyas 'dun ma ci nag s+ho// bde ga shegs sras po chags med pa// byang chub ma
28a4(rgyud): dbang theb lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun du// 'khor 'de byin gyis brlabs lags na// gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas// ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad
28a5(rgyud): 'dzin 'gyur te// bde bar rtog la btsun pa gnas// dpa' bo chernams tsa ma dang // de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol// doni dus la 'ab lags ni// phyi ga lam mngang bsha
28a6(rgyud): gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
28a7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa/ 'dren pa rnams kyi gdasangs rgyas// chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis// rab tu bsgrims che de rtogs bya/ 
28a8(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sbrul sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po kun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa'i gru bani lham pa
28b1(rgyud): gtad pa rin pa che sna bdun gyi phyings bskur ba skragang dang ta babs dang sngags bus brgyan pas/ stod can rdzaH'i tha bris pa/ rin po cha 'dril bu dpyangs pa rin po che sna lnga srad bu zas pa byin kyis
28b2(rgyud): brlabs te/ dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang rdo rje'i phyi ras kun du bskor pa dang rdo rje'i phyi rgya ba du ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang de rje'i srid bus bres pa dang rdo rje bcing
28b3(rgyud): bcings pa dang / rdo rje phur bu dag gdab pa dang thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas snying gi gdug tor thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // 'od zer ded
28b4(rgyud): nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyi gtsug du zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bar de dag sa
28b5(rgyud): pa thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dga' zhing mgunas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbi shwa mu le
28b6(rgyud): sarbaSh+Ta a pra te he ta ba la/ ma hA badz+ra Ad kar Na/ na mo su te swA hA/ de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po spras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang stobs dang byang
28b7(rgyud): kyil la ga dang lam dang 'phags pa'i bdan pa dang stong ba nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa go shi na po'i mtha' las byas pa snyen pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs
28b8(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdorje byin gyis brlabs te byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i lag tu byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun du bzang po
29a1(rgyud): lag tu da byir ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor byed kyil 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
29a2(rgyud): cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang lga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri ba dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
29a3(rgyud): po dang mau dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kyes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lagan rje lagan rdo rje'o zhes brjod do// 'phags pa la gan du
29a4(rgyud): bskur ba/ bam po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang gsang pa' di shes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba su khe b+h+yaHsa
29a5(rgyud): thAHbadz+ra d+ha ra swA hA/ de nas gsang pa'i rdo rjeb snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams dbang byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi la khor thams cad du gsang ba'i bdag po gsang pa'i ba
29a6(rgyud): sa na gci ga nas gcig tu bur zhes grags nas 'di las/ snying po 'di'i mthu dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gan do sa
29a7(rgyud): nini gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun du bsrung ba dang 'gro ba yongs su
29a8(rgyud): slob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbathA badz+ra d+ha ra bi ra bi ra bi kir swA hA/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying
29b1(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
29b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad da
29b3(rgyud): sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang les dang po pa rnams dang sems can rnams kyi rgya ba dang mdun dang mnyal ba'am gnyid kyis log pa'am chos ston pa'am byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
29b4(rgyud): 'am sems can gyi don byed pa 'am sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i brla du thabs cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan can kun du snang ngo // yang de bzhi
29b5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa shes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA di ga badz+ra Ta Ta Ta Ta Ta~M swA hA/ phyogs rdo rjes ba
29b6(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcun sems can marungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcing bar snang ngo // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i de rje'i 'ur bu zhes
29b7(rgyud): ba'i ming po gsung sa pa/ namaHsarba tanA ga teHsarbasu khreb+h+yaHsarba wAn na' rjes hA/ sa ton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma jug / rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
29b8(rgyud): de 'ad rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig na sa go cig tu'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa
30a1(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ya Ta ya Ta~M swA hA/ sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sa
30a2(rgyud): 'og gi phrag thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdorje 'di ni sa'i bag gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'u shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs
30a3(rgyud): de dag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbadz+nyAts+tshan+da/ sarba bIr+yan+dar gri ma pra bar ma la ba d+ha
30a4(rgyud): swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ 
30a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes ska gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
30a6(rgyud): gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHserba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa sasu e b+h+yaHsa rbathA badz+ra la k+Sha/ gri ha ta swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi rdo rjerje snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'dzi
30a7(rgyud): khams rab 'byam thams cad dang gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur zhes
30a8(rgyud): lo/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tig rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsa rba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba nA ha ra ha ra rA ga bangs
30b1(rgyud): nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas thams cad dang klu'i gnas thams cad du/ bye sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan da nga 'di ni
30b2(rgyud): dzA nes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'u zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rjen pa dri ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta nA ga te thAHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ma tha mtha
30b3(rgyud): hri pa sa twa/ rdo rje chen po dri ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas thams cad dang / dri ba'i gnas thams cad du/ kyes byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
30b4(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje 'di ni de ze'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ne sa grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs pa
30b5(rgyud): namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbathA badra ba tatad+hA ra kar ha~M ha swA hA/ de nas rdo/ chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs mthug su 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
30b6(rgyud): thams cad dang nal mkha' lding gi gaunas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gen rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i rdoHzhes skra gcig nas
30b7(rgyud): 'a sa gas so// yang de ban gshegs pa de dag gis chen po che ba tsho snying po gsungs pa/ nabungams thAg sa ba b+h+yaHsa n+deH /  kyis basmran/ danas
30b8(rgyud): 'am ci'o snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams dpa' byam thams cad dang me'am ce'i gnas thams cad du/ kyem byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las
31a1(rgyud): 'drini mi'am ci'i rdang 'o zhes sa gcig nas gcig tu'u shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo/ lho 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ maH
31a2(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ma ha rag badz+ra dA lA ya swA hA/ de nas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang lto 'phye chen
31a3(rgyud): gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshes
31a4(rgyud): pa de dag gis rje/ chen po srin po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra ng+ka rdzas shwar da ha ba n+da \u0f7fhA/ de das rdo chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa
31a5(rgyud): zag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang srin po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin pa'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas sa
31a6(rgyud): tu'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe byaHsa rbatha badra hrid he ha swAhA/ 
31a7(rgyud): rdorje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
31a8(rgyud): zhin dang bden do rjes pa 'groba'i dzi nas sgra gciganas gcig su she sa grags so// yang da bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo chen po'i byung ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsa
31b1(rgyud): katiHsarba su khe b+h+yaHsa rbarbata la rngam pa ma twASh+Tha ta shwa ra mA d+ha/ rdorje chen po 'byung ba'i phung po 'ad gsungs mnag tu'ajag rten gyi khams dpa' byam thams cad dang 'byung ba gas
31b2(rgyud): du/ kye sa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag no rdo rje 'do ni 'byung ba ngo/ chen po zhes zla gciganas gcig 'a gas grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
31b3(rgyud): na pa sha ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsarbata thA ga ta b+h+yaHswA She b+h+yaHsarbanA ma hA badz+ra ci gis rji lan ma mami ma thamaH badz+ras d+ha/ rdo chen po ga pa'i snying po 'di dag
31b4(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sha za'i gnas thams cad de/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha ba'i rdo rje'i zhes sgra gcig nas gci
31b5(rgyud): 'ur nas grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gtso'i snying po gsung sa pa/ na maHsarba tan+ta ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA
31b6(rgyud): de rjen po gnam na byung po'i di gsungs ma thag na gyi/ ma sman 'dumarnams cad dang na sama'i gnas rnams / ma byang chub sems dpa' sems pa na
31b7(rgyud): de'adi ni zhab mo'i do rje zhes sku gcig nas gcig tu' zhes grags so// yad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsa matan ga ta b+h+yaH@
31b8(rgyud): sa 'drag rA li N+DI'i bI mi ri swAH/ de rje srin mi'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas thams cad dang srin ma'i gnas thams cad du/ khyis kyang sa
32a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin mo'i ngo 'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gan
32a2(rgyud): 'i snying po gsungs pa/ namams ta thA ga teHsarba suM khe b+h+yaHsarba thA oM stA ga badz+ra hi si swA hA/ gnon po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig nyid kyi khams rab 'byem thams
32a3(rgyud): gnon pa'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i rdo khro zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur shes grags so// yang de bzhin
32a4(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jig pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba mu kha b+h+yaHsarba ke li ki li badz+ra bi d+ha hi ni swA hA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jig pa
32a5(rgyud): dpo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'a byam nyams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'ang
32a6(rgyud): ba gdon gyi rje'o zhes zla gcig nas gcig tu'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjid byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba
32a7(rgyud): sa ma khe b+h+yaHsarba thA kr-i gra s+pha raNabadra swA hA/ brjed byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rje'i snying po 'di gsungs mthag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang brdad byed kyi
32a8(rgyud): mas cad du/ kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni bad byed kyi rje nas sgra gciganas gcig tu'ur zhes grags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
32b1(rgyud): dgagis yang gdon thams cad brnyog pa'i rdo rje'i sring po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba nA par 'adz+raHsarba gra ha ni kran tan dzA te ba la bo da ra ra Ta ra Ta swA hA/ gden pa
32b2(rgyud): bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du/ kyes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan/ 
32b3(rgyud): ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje nas sgra gcig nas gcig tu ru shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lnga la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs // 
32b4(rgyud): namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba badz+re badz+ri sa so swA hA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang lha la sogs pa thams
32b5(rgyud): cad kyi gnas rnamasas/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lta la sogs pa'i snying po rdo rje'o nas sgra gcig nas gcig tu ru zhes grags so/ 
32b6(rgyud): pa de dag gis nad kyi gdan tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ sepas shAg te mam su khe b+h+ya sarbanAtwa~M shad+d+ha mr-i ShA thA bA hA/ rje sman chen pon chen po'i snying pa
32b7(rgyud): gsungs sa thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams raba'i phyim thams cad dang ci sman chen po'i gnas rnams su/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa la gan dor 'di ni ci sman gyi do rje
32b8(rgyud): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'u shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon bsal ba'i rdo rjerje snying po gsungs ga/ na maHbtsa ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa mas e
33a1(rgyud): sarbarbA traT tra Ta badz+ra swA hA/ nad bsal ba'ang 'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ kyes byang chub sems dpa' sems
33a2(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'u shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snyi
33a3(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na maHsarbata thA ga ta d+d+haHsarba su khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ya mr-i tong b+ha ba badz+wal la la la swA hA/ rkub 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
33a4(rgyud): thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes bya ba gcig nas gcig tu 'a shes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs
33a5(rgyud): de dag gis 'che ba rab rten par byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ maHsarba tathA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu la b+h+yaHsarbathA kA ti badz+ra ya ha ta swA hA/ 'chi ba rab tu ni par byed pa'i rdo rje skyeng
33a6(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi kham par pa'abyam thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'ad ni 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas
33a7(rgyud): gcig tu'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i mdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta nA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA pa ra ma
33a8(rgyud): bangs dri gro ma ma byed pan ma hAg du gtsug drug swA hA/ drung 'thams cad 'gog pa'i ba snying po 'digasungs ma thag tu 'dreg tan ma'ams 'byor bam pa cad du
33b1(rgyud): ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'don du thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje zhes sku gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
33b2(rgyud): dag gis 'khor les skur ba chen po'i stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsan ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbaSh+Ta.oM badz+rAHkra baN+Di hUM swA hA/ de nas 'khor lo
33b3(rgyud): ra ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rter gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems
33b4(rgyud): gnas thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po dang srin po dang 'thung po dngag zam tshogs nas thams cad du rdo rje chen po'i
33b5(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya pa'i sgra gci gnas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sbyar ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsirba tartag te
33b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba trA~M/ bas / 'a na ga shegs pa de dag shes stu la mi la po chen chag pa rnam pa can pa sa ma
33b7(rgyud): la byed te/ byin nas kyang 'dabor gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi smin stug po'i dre brkyed po pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khalas dang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
33b8(rgyud): stag po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas tshal gsum gyi byin gyi ma brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo byin gyis brlabs nas
34a1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das shAm thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lags
34a2(rgyud): ngordzasu bka' stsal po/ rigs kyi dud bzhin gshegs pa rnams cang ches dkyil le ri 'a khor los snang bachen po'i dzirje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag su de ngas dbang bskur bas khyed dpa
34a3(rgyud): bskor to// ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no// 'khor lo so sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so// rdo rje snying po thams ca
34a4(rgyud): na to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyed bstan pa thams cad byed ni bya ba dang bzung bar gnong ngo po// khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lamachen po yongs su rdzogs so// rigs kyi phud pa
34a5(rgyud): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig rigs kyi bu lag na rdo rje dngar bskur ba'i da
34a6(rgyud): sa kyang bka na dul/  ldan 'das dag ga nga bdags la pa'i chos dam pa tho pace lda 'a sa pa
34a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i
34a8(rgyud): chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs so// de nas lagan chu rdo rje chags pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying zhes bya ma'i mam ma
34b1(rgyud): pa gzugs ma cag tud dam can kyo mas thams cad da shong byams cadranam pa drug tug yos kun du rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum kyi song chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi
34b2(rgyud): 'di thams cad kyang rnam badrug tu g.yom ra rtag yos kun du rab tu g.yos so// che mche ma rab tu chematshe ma kun du rab tu chem me// 'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu la
34b3(rgyud): nadu rab tu lda / shar phyogs mngon nu phrigs dma'o// nub phyogs mngon shing phyogs dma'o// / phyogs pa 'o kyang phyogs dpa'o// 'ang byegs ma chen
34b4(rgyud): dri ma'o// de rje ma'i ni mtha'i dma'o// mtha'o mthon dbus de ma'o// snang ba chen po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag skrag tu gyur ba na 'khod pa
34b5(rgyud): dedag ma 'di ldang bar byas nas sems can kyang da ga do skyes pa de dag pan tshun pa lta shing gtsigasas gcig ma thong nas sems can gzhan dgagacig 'dir byas pa byas
34b6(rgyud): ldan dgug ci ba 'dir skyes pa lazhes pa mo// de dgags bsdus pad rgyang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' dzin 'i ma ba'i ming po'i gzugs kyi mchos chen/ 
34b7(rgyud): dag gis chos de thos nas dring ba rted de shi ba phos nas rgya'i nang du skyes te shing si la sna tshogs kyi la mtshan bkod pa'i nags sreg pasgral bde lag nam rje dbang rdzu
34b8(rgyud): dbang bsrung ba'i byang ma sems dpa' sems da na pa lagan galas 'di pyag thabs mam na/ tshe'i sems can rgya ma gar chen padas
35a1(rgyud): thang da cig de dang yad namede dang bang cig de ma cha ba gar to// de che 'grol ste gnas kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to// yi dgas rgyag nas thams ca
35a2(rgyud): po che sna bdun Ti rabs kun du 'asor ba dang / lha'i zas dang / ma dang / gabyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur te//  sngal sde chags kyi rgyal mtshan pa
35a3(rgyud): la smye 'das byung ba chen po snang / 'i ma dang tshub rje 'phrul rgya sa samam yin ldanam ldan ma pan
35a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i 'od dngas bcu po pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od pa gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mag mog por gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i gag na rdo rje byeng mad na
35a5(rgyud): mas par gnags ba 'i thug thams ca ma brgyal blongs zhes pa pa'i ldan rgyags pani rnaM de ni migs gdang gi dpral bu'i kho
35a6(rgyud): dag sa na ga mas sa da btsun pa dang / ma du na nga shA dang / mas da ga
35a7(rgyud): / brjed byed grub pa sprul 'dzin brtul// na ne na pa bgegs dang lag 'du na migs// dan gyi chags rnams thams cad ni// mer sna yongs su btu byos la// dul ba
35a8(rgyud): gyis mnyam gzhan ste// sangs rgya sam chos dang dge 'dun pa// sems pa danan skye so// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'ad// rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa// nags tshal
35b1(rgyud): banyamasas da/ 'bar// yid 'ang khang pa brgyags na bzhugs// dang ma mnan pa maman// dam chag yangs su sul byos la// ngan lang yis dmas te// sa rnam sa kun du mya bar byas/ 
35b2(rgyud): zhan du khyed cag de rang nyid// rdo rje bar bya ba 'grags pa// 'bar ba 'jigs chen de dag gis// mgon shin du 'bems par 'gyur// de ltar khro ba'i rgyal po dag/ 'jig rten
35b3(rgyud): sa ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de'i tshe 'thung ba'i tshogs thams cad byang chub sems dpa
35b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i bstan pa 'di tshol zhing sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo // chos la skabs su dong ngo // dge 'dun la skabs su dang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
35b5(rgyud): yang phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe rang gi snying pa smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu ke b+h+yaHsarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro/ Nab
35b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po sgras ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten DI khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi kyil 'khor thams cad dang lba da
35b7(rgyud): da nad sbyin dang dri ba dang lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ni dang sbo 'ab chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams sa rje ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
35b8(rgyud): po lagan rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag pa'o// lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la
36a1(rgyud): sapa shin / btab par gyur // denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po largan rdo rje drug ci zhing pa 'di mas nas/ den ma de bzhin gshegs pas
36a2(rgyud): kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khang mi N+DI la 'i thams cadal bzlas te dkyil latsho chen po skyes so// ma pa pon sa sa // de nam
36a3(rgyud): ma 'gang shing sa tsung byed/ khri yang lagan la// yid gnyis pa ma med pa dang // dus gos de na shes dang // byas pa de bzhin 'den sgrub/ thob dpond
36a4(rgyud): rnam da / gas ldan pa 'amam na nan pa sgyum nga po da na ma ma
36a5(rgyud): 'o// de'i 'ogatu ma kun po drug 'i rnyeng sa srings ka da du gsas bsres pa dag sbyin sbyir bak+ku' b+h+ya// de'i 'i gtu'akhor los sgyur bya'i dmyalal bar chen po'i
36a6(rgyud): dbus su 'dug bcom ldan 'dapa 'khor pos sbyor ba chen po bzlas pa bya'o// drug po dang chen po srab ma dag bar bya ba dang bsrung bachogapa'o// de'i 'ogatus la
36b1(rgyud): bya rlo / segs dang mam med pas pa pa thag sung lasags pa'i sngon da bral ba ngan mas cad du 'dugs pa'o// da na pa gsum ya rnaMs zangs ngan
36b2(rgyud): yin pa yi 'thun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa dang nyi ma dang byed pa dang yud \u0f7fma dang chu skar dang gza' ba bang por mngon pa la las garnams na shes par 'gyur ro// dmar dang ser
36b3(rgyud): dang dkar dang nag/ badren ma pa ni snga ma yin// gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni// mkhas pas khragang tsam pamos nas// sngags pa yi spyan brkos pa de// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar ga/ 
36b4(rgyud): ldagan rnam pa kun du mchog/ khang ched du 'bring du brjod// gang bar ma sbyar sa de spang // mkhas pas der ni partsam mi bya// dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan// dmar po dbang gi dan
36b5(rgyud): 'dod// ser po ches par shes par bya// nag pa drug shul spyod par shes// de don mchod yon gter ma dang // mar me sdes dang bdug pa dang // bsgrims tabyin nas bsrung bya ste/ 
36b6(rgyud): shum par gzhag nas sal brjod// de yi nub mos der ni// sU sha ba ting ba'i steng du nyag// gal tes de du gyur na// dang ni bsgrim sa te bri ba bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas
36b7(rgyud): kisI// de ni dgegs med yin zhe sa brjod// gzha du na ni der mi bri// 'gregs dang bcas pas phung bar bskur// de nas sngags pa langs nas ni// de yi nyon mo mkhas pa lces/ 
36b8(rgyud): ni ga du yangs bzang byor// sbyin sris pa rgyam te// spang gyi dang ni ma nga // yang 'gres sbyi gas ra// ni masas kyis skyes ga / 
37a1(rgyud): gcig sbyin pasreg tu/ de nas grags pasas bgos pa/ sade nyid kyil sar dag dang / yang na dkyil 'khrur la na// sngags pas skyes byas sa dag nga/ 
37a2(rgyud): par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya// phyogs che dag dang smai'i rnams// kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du// rin chen sna lngas rab mjas pa// bye brag de ni ma dbus su// rin chen sna lnga gzhag
37a3(rgyud): par bya// de nas yon tan ldan pa yi// slob ma dag ni gdams te gzung // be zlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kun gyis// bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya// mchog sbyin rdo rje rje
37a4(rgyud): gsong sngags 'di ni zlos pa ni// spyan dang yon tan nam spyad pas// de dag thog mar brtag par bya// yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni// shin du brtags nis gzung bar bya// rig dpa
37a5(rgyud): phud sum tshogs// gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang // shes rab ldan brtan byas bzo dang // dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang // gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang // 
37a6(rgyud): nga dag theg rten dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang // yang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang // pal gus dang ma la gus// bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang // gang dag pha rol
37a7(rgyud): dospyod la// snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang // gang dag drang zhing nges pa dang // g.ya med cing ni tshe sra brtson dang // lus drang ngag dang yang dag pa// de dag nye bar brtags gzung bya// 
37a8(rgyud): dag nga nas 'jig rten 'di // 'jig rten pa ro ba yang ches dang // bram ze ma la rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson dang // sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'ang
37b1(rgyud): de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bya// nyan thos theg pa can rnams min// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg can min// zhar ba lag zha zam dang // skar po 'on pa mi thung dang // gang dag sA le ba
37b2(rgyud): dang // de bzhin mig yon gnang bag can// 'jungs dang byab pa mig zo dang // mkhas snyams sems dang gsan can dang // sngags kyi theg pa rnyed chen gyi// thog pa la ni ma mas pa// 
37b3(rgyud): yang gzung maH// de dag bstan 'di sem pa med// bstan pacos mi shes mi ga zung ste// bang butha~M rje 'dzin pa dang // de bzhin tham mi klas dang // da pa de dag byed du yang // ga
37b4(rgyud): 'am tshang dang // rlung na dag dang 'bang po dang // yan lag zhug par gyur pa rnams// mkhas pas ba sgrims te yongs su spyad/ skad sdes pa'i sgrub 'i rnams//  tshe tshig bzhin pa
37b5(rgyud): gcig du yod na 'di gzung ngo // yang na srong ma bzhi zhi ga gzung // de nas snang ba byed bcug la// sras dang me hag rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khyer nang gis la ni// ku sha ga dang pa
37b6(rgyud): des pa na gad+ha// de ni rtag/ na 'du mam ma /  mas // ga chen sa rkyen de/ 
37b7(rgyud): bya// yang stsa/ sa brjod las bya blang ba y-i// khyon tan kun du ga na /  chub sam myed par rnams kyi ni// rdzu ba phrul la stsogs yod 'dzad// pharos tshun
37b8(rgyud): rjeg// de dag phud cem yang tsam brjod// rab kyi ldan sa // gas nya mi la mi ba'ang ches na// dag na mtshog gsus la gzhol rnams kyis// dam langs pa
38a1(rgyud): rabaH// sangs cas spya kyar 'dun das na// khyod kyis de dag brjod pa cis/ pang+gA'i ste na 'dunan mtshan// gzung dang mthong ba 'ang banan te/ 
38a2(rgyud): bcol pa dang / rgyal dang 'brung la 'dod bzhin no//  rgyas mayon da dga' ste// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba rnams dang // 'jig tan rang sangs sus rnams dang // nyan pa
38a3(rgyud): rnams dang gang mkhas pa// de dag mthong na snying dga' bo// me yi phung po grags pa dang // ba langs khyu mchog glang chen dregs// na dkar po dgang 'gyur ba// de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang // 
38a4(rgyud): bralang lha yang shes pa yin// tham pA dang ni rgyal rigs dang // rdul po dag par grags pa dang // sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // de dag mthong na shis par
38a5(rgyud): lam ska zhing gtam zer dang // rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang // sha chen za bar byed pa dang // khrag gis 'khru bar byed pa dang // de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa za// zho dang 'bras chan za ba dang / 
38a6(rgyud): bung 'byung bar byed pa dang // skra 'breg pa ni mchog yin no// so yang lhung bar gyur pa dang // phung phreng dang n+ya krod+ha// de la 'ji gra ba gis par 'gyur// legs so bu zhe'amathe ldan zhes// 
38a7(rgyud): de shad ces pa dang / yid du 'du ba 'bung me la// rkyen sa zhal ba byed pa dang // tshangs badrug pa'i ya //  'jug ni zla ba dang // lus ngan po nod sbyin dang // bam sbyin du
38a8(rgyud): da sas ma nga/ la na sa/ na di se me // sa pa dang mas sag sa / 
38b1(rgyud): gzung mi bya// sal chug dang mchod pa dang // gar byed pa dang grulen dang // nod dang bang brang mel// nod pa shan du ngan pa yin// 'brumar gyis ni lus bskus dang // gcer bu dag dang sla ba dang
38b2(rgyud): kar ba 'theng ba sbur po dang // mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang // phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang // bong bu rnams kyang de bzhin te// ma he rngam sde spang dag/ me la ma mthong ba rtag tu sdud// rtse gsum
38b3(rgyud): sub gdengs thegs dang // mi ga dmar shin du 'jigs pa dang // gcer bu dag dang sna leb dang // sngags mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang // mdog gnas mi bzang chen po dang // gas sngon go
38b4(rgyud): nga mi sdug pa// su yis mi lam rmis pa ni// de la dngos grub yod ming gyur// zung shig tso ba shid tshems theg ce ma// ze shig ces pa'i mi bzang sbra// drag po 'jigs byed khro thos dang // 
38b5(rgyud): dang ma rje de shel pa dang // bya rgod bzhad dang bya dkar dang // 'ug pa ba rog byil dang // bye ba sdig pa sre mo sbrul// gang dag gzhan yang skye bo gdug/ de dag mi la ma mthong gyur tam// reg par gyur na lnga
38b6(rgyud): shig// denas ste rten pa 'a niHsa rje snyed pa'i nam yul ldanas rgyas bte ba ste kham bstsal ga ming m-is ga ti bus te// gangs bka' tshemo gong chu
38b7(rgyud): pa'i nang du snod du ba bstan zhing khyed de re nga bas kyi ched shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// tam nu na reg pa'i la ma 'jigs med kyis// sreg zhugs dang yam bsregs shing kyi shu
38b8(rgyud): cig sbyin sreg pa'o// de nas pa la d+ma'i ganga'am yang na u dum par sor bcad tsam gyi sa shing bya// zogam gcis ni me tog brgyan// rdo rje drag pa'i sngags pa tab la// de dag la ni btsal
39a1(rgyud): / byer rten// shAr gyi phyogs su mdun pabastan num// yang na kyang phyogs bstan ta gan ga/ gsang grags mthun pa dan byas sa// ga mas de nan gagags padag// denas
39a2(rgyud): skye nyin slob marnams// nga byed du bcuganas s+ho// de mings ma zhes // srid pa gsum pa mongs byed pa// en pa byer de dag pa// drim med pa'i gzungs rgyan // srid du rdzun pa
39a3(rgyud): / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed// mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' bla ldan pa// thams cad kyi ni ma yin te// sdig pa thams
39a4(rgyud): byed pa// den kun tu ga dra ste// slob kyi na byams cangad du// gtum nya par gzhagam /  tshan las bas / TIg nga ba bzang nas pa// skams nyis
39a5(rgyud): cad la// thig ni legs par gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su// sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // de bzhin du/ 'ching ba dang // 'khor los skyer brnyan byas la
39a6(rgyud): bdag nyid der ba rnams byas nas su// de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la// de des par phyags kha bltas te// shar phyogs nyid du zag ga ba po// de nas yang ni bskad byas la// rub phyogs
39a7(rgyud): bltas 'dug nas su// nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab po// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// byung gi phyogs su kha bltas la// byang phyogs nyid du theg gdab po// de nas yang ni bskur blas la// 
39a8(rgyud): sa slon/ khab zlas te// rnam pa dbyib shes pa yis// so phyogs su mig ga dpa pa// deg nang phyogs dkyil 'khor ne// chab cang yang par ba bya// de nas de lha'i tshul ma/ 
39b1(rgyud): phyogs bzhi yongs su bskor byas la// kun du gru bzhi lham par ni// rab tu bsgrims te gdab par bya// dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas su// mi yi phyogs su phyogs 'dug la// sngags pas sngags
39b2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin// gar pags rjes kyi tshig gdab bo// de nas chog shes pa yis// gus pas dbang ldan phyags spong la// nub phyogs su ni kha bal sa te// byang phyogs ngos kyi theg gdab bo// dbang
39b3(rgyud): phyogs nas/ song nas su// rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// der ni lce phyogs kha bltas la// nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab pa// gnas de nas ni dbrang la// bden bral phyogs su song nas su// 
39b4(rgyud): sa kyi'ang du ni// thig srud legs par gdab par bya// kun du ku bzhi lham par ni// de ltar gnas de byas nas su// de nas phyi rol de bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du cha brgyang bya// tshad ni
39b5(rgyud): klu yin te// slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis so// de nas byung la zla ldan gyis// cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya// phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni// khru grangs nyi shuH lnga'o// deng yang snga ma ci bzhin du// chab
39b6(rgyud): dadu bcad par bya// bcang panas ni brla nas su// thugs pa mas ni thams ca // 'khor ba'i kyi ni ga dpapar \u0f7f// gnas gsus dug dngas par mi / che ba dag dga'atshamapa / 
39b7(rgyud): sri'i sprin gdong por bya// dpel 'khor drim pa par mni// sna ma nyis 'gyur skor shes nas// drim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang // sgog dag kyang mkhas pas b+ha// rtababs dag gi tshang nas
39b8(rgyud): dbus kyi cha dang mnyam par bya// lga yi gtso bo rnams la yang // ske gang dag ni bya bar bya// rim pa gsum du nam dbye bas// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs bye la// sngags mgon dag la
40a1(rgyud): / gnas nas su// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// tshon ci 'dir ni bye brag tu// rin chen cwa lnga yin par bded// sA lu btags pa'i phyi yang rung // tsi lur 'byor
40a2(rgyud): byang yang rung // gos dkar pags shing gtsang byas la// dul zhi rje khab cing snganas su// brnams te bang sha dbyigs mtshams nas// chen rtsi dag ni dbye b.rabya// de zlab dur chu
40a3(rgyud): sam// yang na lcags kyu' phyag rgyas sam// snod kyi phyag tu'i tshul gyis sam// rig byed 'dron pa'i lag pas so// thog mar dkar po dbye bar bya// de yi 'ug tu dmar po dkye// de yi 'og
40a4(rgyud): sngon po dgye// de yi 'og tu ljang khud kye// thams cad dag gi nang rol du// sngags pas chen ni nag po dkye// cha bachad dag tu gang bstan pa// dbus kyi cha yi cha rnam pa ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs
40a5(rgyud): sa rnams kyi ste// de dag rdo rje bcer tshul 'dod// gdan ni pad mar bstan pa ste// mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin// de yi steng rdo rdo rje gzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje gtsug tor te// me h+ye
40a6(rgyud): ba'i snying po bya// med nas bon ldan par bya// de la shang gyi phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs par na chen me tog gzhag par bya'o// lde phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin du nus
40a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'adabang po'o// nub phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med do// byang phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o// byang shar phyags mtshams su ni de bzhin gshes
40a8(rgyud): pagatsug tor can no// kar lha'i phyogs mtshams suni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs sa//  nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyeb / 
40b1(rgyud): bang gi phyogs mtsham du mi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ga// mdor na dbus kyi pad man// 'da' ma brgyad par brjod pa ste// 'dab ma dkar be shar phyogs su// nub phyogs sun dmar pa nya
40b2(rgyud): nga phyags 'di sde po 'o// sngags sun nag pa nyid// 'ad lda sa rnams kun du// tshal rnams kyis 'dren mar gsungs// de nga 'dums su// brim pa na pa'i 'du' bya// 
40b3(rgyud): pi steng du pu chen te// 'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri// bla ga ma 'dra zhing drag pa ste// 'od ni dbyar gyi sprin mdog 'dra// rlung gi steng du ma bri ste// dbyibs ni gru gsum gnas pa yin/ 
40b4(rgyud): de 'bras bu zur gsum pa// 'jig pa'i dus kyi med pa na tshungs// de yi dbus su pa ma bri// 'odado na dus ma pa'i med da mangs// de yi snying po dbus su ni// 'khor mas sgyung 'bri bar bya// 
40b5(rgyud): del bcom ldan 'das don gzugs sa ma phyag rgya blam yi ga ci rigs su gzhag par bya'o// phan mye ga zhag na rdo rje // bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya// de 'i phyi rol cha rnams ni// bcang
40b6(rgyud): bedag tu 'ang sdem bzhin// sngags pas cho ga ci bzhin du// lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs
40b7(rgyud): pad ma pa sbyin po'i rdo rje'i 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// shar l+le'i phyogs mtsham su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
40b8(rgyud): rnams 'khar dang bcas pa med bzhin mi nor bu'i phyog rgya dang bcas pabri'o// ste phyogs su ni deji'i 'khor bo 'o'adathal 'khor du lag na rjoba'i dang bcas shing deje 'chang thams cad
41a1(rgyud): // lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag ca dang bcas pa bri'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshums du ni rdo rje 'khor lo dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor pa
41a2(rgyud): bcas pa yid bzhin rtsoni 'u 'phyag cha dang banas pa zi'o// nub byags suni rdo 'khor la'u dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' rnam mkha'i snying po 'khar dang bcas par la gri 'phya/ 
41a3(rgyud): rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su ni pad ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril pa spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya dang
41a4(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su ni pad ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad ma'i phyag rgya da
41a5(rgyud): pa dgod par bya'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams suni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa
41a6(rgyud): dgod par bya'o// phyogs bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du chud par bri'o// de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phya bra nA nI dbyug to yin na
41a7(rgyud): 'phags skyes pa'i phyag rgya ni betson no// mig mi bzang gi phyag ca ni rdo rje'o// lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o// phyi rol 'khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham
41a8(rgyud): bzhi gtod pa sgo khang dang rta babs dang mu ran shin du rnam par phye ba 'khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lhan mas 'khor dang bcas
41b1(rgyud): bri'o// de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo'i phyag tu dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs sun tshangs palnga bar dang bcas pa pad+ma ma'i phyag rgya da nga bcas pa bri'o// 6
41b2(rgyud): nga'i bang phyogs su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi bar gi phyag tu dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa bum pa'i phyag cha dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su ni dpal chen
41b3(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya
41b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri'o// brgya byin rje lce phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing ta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// me'i phyogs su ni drang srong me lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas
41b5(rgyud): lte phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar phyogs su ni 'chi bdag 'cha bdag ni dril bu'o// mtshan mo nag mo'i ni tog go/ nag mo'i ni
41b6(rgyud): zhags pa'o// drag po'i chur ma ni mdung rje gsum pa'o// tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni pad ma'o// bu 'jug gi chung ma 'i ni 'khor lo'o// gzhon nu'i chung ma'i ni mdung thung ngo // phag gi chung mya 'on thob
41b7(rgyud): tsamuN+Da ni mi thod do// dbang po'i chung ma'i ni rdo rje'o// lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug tA'o// gshin rje'i nub phyags ni yingags rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sha ba rnam
41b8(rgyud): ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag cha dang bcas pa bri'o// gnon po rnams ni lcags kyu rdo rje can gyi phyag cha dang bcas pa bri'o// grib gnon nams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// brjed
42a1(rgyud): rnams ni lag pabrang la bcar ba'i phyag tu dang bcas pa bri'o// mkha' 'gro rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag ca dang bcas pa bri'o// sen mo rnams ni mche brjod can gyi phyag rgya'am rtse
42a2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// shaza me rnams ni rdo rje po bcol gyi lag pa'i phyag cha dang bcas pa bri'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas
42a3(rgyud): pabri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu lnga 'khor dang bcas pa dang / klu'i rtsal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i bu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bre'o// 
42a4(rgyud): ske dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcus pa bri'o// de dang nye bar dka' thub pazlog rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su
42a5(rgyud): bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su thag bzang ris la sogs pa lum yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug te rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang
42a6(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa bdan gyi phyag ma dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su rnamathos kyi bul sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug
42a7(rgyud): rdo rje can me phyag rtsa dang bcas po bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogs su byab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu dam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa
42a8(rgyud): 'i phyag ma dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar phyogs su sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri ba'i rgyal po rnapas dang ldan pa la sogs pa ma'am ci rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas par
42b1(rgyud): bragartsa dang bcas pa bri'o// de la dri ba rnams kyi brag marnams ni rngabe'u dang peg rnams so// ming mtshor brag rgya dgan sla ba'i pa bang la sogs pa brdung bskang pa rnams so// de nas lha'ang chen pa rnams pa
42b2(rgyud): chen po rnams rang gi zer chu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas skye dgu'i bdag po reg byad 'dor pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag ga shar phyogs su zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad ma da'
42b3(rgyud): babum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o// nub sgor ni ki li ki li la rang gi phyag rgya bri ste drag po rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang sgor ni sgo bsrungs gnyis bri bar byaste// de la gnod sbyin gyi rtsa
42b4(rgyud): ma thos kyi ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// shar \u0f7f/ ni khro bo rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste de la 'jig rten gsum rnab par
42b5(rgyud): tAl ba ni rdo rje'i phyag tu dang bcas pa bri'o// ba con sngon po can ni btson 'i phyag dang bcas pa bri'o// skye skor ni thub par dka' tha ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// mngon phyogs su ni rdo rje phyag rgya dang bcas
42b6(rgyud): bri'o// big legs su ni rtsa mtsho dang rgya mtsho'i 'graman sring me bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar byaste// de la tu ma pu ru'i phyag tu ni dbyug to'o// rgyal me'i phyag rgya ni mdung thung rtse gsum pa'o/ 
42b7(rgyud): ma par rgyal ma'i phyag rgyan pad ma'o// mi pa ma ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o// gzhan gyis mi bub ma'i phyag rgya ni rje rje'o// sring ma bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug gi bu 'khor dang bcas pa mang
42b8(rgyud): ga rgya dang bcas pabreb// byang phyogs su nor ga sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ma gri dang ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bre'o// 'khor thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o// 
43a1(rgyud): / de dag de ltar lhag mar brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang rdo rje drug pas byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// dkyil 'khor ci las ni ba bde dag ni da drag po byung / 
43a2(rgyud): pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// lagan rdo rje dbang bskur ba las dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa'i cho ga'o// cho ga shes pas de lta bAr// rdo rjerje dkyil 'khor mchog bris te// byin gyis brlabs
43a3(rgyud): ba byas nas su// rab tu sgrims te mchod par bya// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnas// kha yi chag shel kha can// mgrin pa ring zhing lto che ba// nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya// sa bon rin chen sna lngas
43a4(rgyud): bkang // spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang // khargyan ya lags khebs byas shing // de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la// mgul bcings kyis kyang bcings byas la// kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgo
43a5(rgyud): tho bzhi pa ni thams cad du// bum ba snga ma ci bzhin du// brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste// dgu pa don pasang gtor ba// rdo rje drug pos nam kun tu// bskams ted de sngags kyis bdag/ bcu
43a6(rgyud): dbus su shes par bya// da ni 'khor los sgyur la dbul// rta babs rnams ni mdzes paste// rin chen rnam pa bzhi las bya// yang na yid 'ong shing las bya// tsan dan yang na gzhan yang dang / 
43a7(rgyud): dum bu ma yin mthugs pa// gas pa srid cing 'dzer pa med // bdun dang pa kyu dang // si la 'i 'dra ga te 'dra dang // rin chen dril bu dbang byangs shing // dang dang rimi la sogs byas ba na/ 
43a8(rgyud): ni bcad dam bdun na ma drug/ me ga phreng nga ldan par 'dod// snying ngu na che che ma ga// mnyeg can thong dam par dbyang // dang nga ras kyang dbyung bar bya// dkyil 'khor pa cheb / 
43b1(rgyud): bA// dog lnga tshogs pa dan nams// phyogs bzhe dag tu dbyang bar bya// srang bu la ni bcu par bya// dril busgra dbyangs ldan par bya// kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams// ci rigs par ni bre bar bya/ 
43b2(rgyud): rin chen bzhi las byas pa 'am// de med zangs las byas pa'ang rung // mchod pa'i yon gyi snod bzhi zhig/ bla dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// sna tshogs sdes su gsungs pa ni// gur gum dang ni can pa
43b3(rgyud): dang // spri ka la sogs ci yang rung // srog chags yan lag kun mi rung // sna tshogs bdug pa dbul byas te// a ka ru dang sbron shing dang // ga pur shi ribs kan tso bog dang ni ru
43b4(rgyud): zang chu dang // yang nathang shing thang chu dbul// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rim pa'am// rdo rje drag po bzlas brjod pa// ut+pal dang padam mchog/ tsam pag dang klu shring dang // ges ra dang ma li ka mya
43b5(rgyud): tshad dang b+ha sngar dang // ta kar dang pun ga/ deng ka'i mi tog mdzes pa yin// kar bI ra ku mu ta// s+thA ma dan+ta ka ra yaM// me rnye kyi rigs dbul bar bya// de bzhin lta ba shos sna tshogs te// b+ho
43b6(rgyud): dang 'bras chen dang // mar dang skung rtse rab tu bzang // bag chos dang ni la du dang // srung rtsi gzhag pa'i cung bang dang // a sho ba ti na kA/ spyan gzigs khacu grags pa dang // shi re d+he d+ha ka sa ta/ 
43b7(rgyud): kar ka dang ni// be reg dang ni dri che dang // sha ku la dang bar bta// 'bru yil thu 'breng bu dang // shun thab li ka dag dang // g+ha ri ga dang sA ste ka/ mon sran gre'u'u te'u dang // rtsa 'ad ni drungs pa
43b8(rgyud): 'bras chu tshogs kyi bya//  'dod ldan pa // tsug gi rjes pa'i sa pa / sri dngam chu // glegam kyi // bu ma khris tis
44a1(rgyud): / sman dang // rab tu skams te byas pa dang // bu ram sna tshogs bcos bdag/ kun du rnam pa thams cad dbul// rnam pa sna tshogs sho dag dang // zho bsrubs bur ma pa
44a2(rgyud): des dbul// 'am lags par bcugs pa dang // de bzhin btung ba rnams cad dbul// khar 'dabu 'a khar dang // ma dang bur ma 'brum // skang rtsi dang na ldan ma dang // dge ba
44a3(rgyud): pa bul bar bya// btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang // dmagul dang mal cha dang // snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman dang // rab tu sgrims te cho ga bzhin/ 
44a4(rgyud): dachub sem pa coMb lda sa// denas sas la yang // nabad sa thA/ me lang mig ldan meng yo nga // du dang de bzhin gi nams byungan
44a5(rgyud): srung ba'i bring // mnyen pa kun la dbul bar bya// slob pa rnam pa thams cad du// de ltar legs par mtshang byas nas// de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya// snying po cheg bzhin
44a6(rgyud): gzugs te shu \u0f7fgcig ni// tshod bzhin du sbyin thagaH// mas cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba// zho dang 'om spyad rtsi'o// yi ge klog pa bzhi zhig cing // phyogs bzhi dag drug zha
44a7(rgyud): de la shi phyogs bzhag pa// 'phags pa shes rab pa rol sbyin// byu phyogasas mdo bzhag pa// gastir 'ad da mnga'ang ma byas bzhed// nub byags su ni gags byag/ 
44a8(rgyud): gshegs pa pags pa yin// ldeng po kod pa'i tshul chen ni// lA byigs lags su shes par bya// dkyil 'khor ldanam mchi khar// dadagal lang gus par mdzod// da
44b1(rgyud): ni bkug pa'adi// bsrud pa rnams ca dam pa yin// de nas pa rnams thams cad kyang // de la nAn dkris par 'gyur// gang dag bajug rten ma snyan pa// de dag phyags phyags 'grub
44b2(rgyud): de lta bas na nam kun du// de medam chos bklag par bya// sleb mthams cad bos nas su// de dag la ni skabs gsum smin// sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya// sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ mkhas
44b3(rgyud): pas cho ga 'di bzhin du// byang chub sems kyang bgyid du gzhug/ rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis// de nas kun du bsang gtor bya// dam tshig yongasu brjede byas la// mkhas pa nang du zhags
44b4(rgyud): su// gos rnams yongs pu badze bya ste// sngags kyis mngon du gdab par bya// de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis// slab ma de dag gdong bkab ba// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag sngags
44b5(rgyud): pas 'ching bcug ste// lag tu ma tog byin b+h+yas nas/ shar yig bsam// slob pa kun rdzi snang snar ni// me tig de dag gdong du gzhus// the dang ldan pas sgrub sa yi// nag yas do rje

45a1(rgyud): chen po gnas gang du// me yi thab kyi khang bu bgyi// lam sreg shing ni ji lta bur// las ni ci zhig brtsam par brtse// khyab bdag zag khung bka' stsal la// bdag ga tha tshams
45a2(rgyud): stso'o// de da ces smras pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin po lazhan de rjes 'jam dpal gzhan nu gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs

45b1(rgyud): la dgang thugs byin nas na// bla ma g.yan du gzhag par bya// de dgar re'i phyir yang na// dgang blugs nya shu lnga lnga ba breg/ rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams// 'di lta bu dag rab byas te/ 
45b2(rgyud): dang ni chas pa dang // dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'o// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas// mar dang 'o ma sbyad rtsi'o// \u0f7fsa zho dang babras chan dang // gang dag gzhan nas gsungs pabya// drag bul byed
45b3(rgyud): gsungs// dbang byas snga martsa bzhin du// las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis// ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg pa// ci ltar rigs pas sa las// de dag la ni yan dkrug go/ yang ni yang lag
45b4(rgyud): de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis// de la chen sleb dpon la// slob ma rnams kyis yon dbul lo// ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis// 'jig
45b5(rgyud): ka tu mkhas pas 'dod// de bzhin gyi ba 'di la yang // slob dpon de ni mog 'drar 'dod// dper na mi yi khams des ni// bud shing thams cad sreg par byed// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/ 
45b6(rgyud): dashing sreg par byed// dper na chu yi khams de ni// 'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcad// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // gdung ba kun gcod shes par hA// dper na rlung gi khams de ni/ 
45b7(rgyud): na thams cad rtag tu 'asgrub// de bzhin slob dpen slab ma la// dge bar rnam par sgrub par byed// dper na lus can thams cad la// san rten du grags pa yin// de bzhin dri ni slob dpon yang
45b8(rgyud): chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin// dper na bcom ldan nam snang mdzad// chos kun rtags par khang du chud// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// chos kun rtogs par khong du chud// dper na dpa
46a1(rgyud): ldan rdo 'chang // gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // 'dir ni sngags kyigs pa 'a na// dgan mchogagadum kyi sngagasas rnams/ 
46a2(rgyud): ni rtag tu brjod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// bsngags pa chen po'i nga brjod par byed// dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra 'o// yang dag la ma ni ston mdzad pa// de bzhin sngags pa
46a3(rgyud): jigs me kyang // thig chen gnas 'di ston pa yin// bdag lar sngags pa de bzhin te// slob de na ci bzhin tshu la de bzhin// slob dan tshan yan tan bzung // rkyen rnams nas yang ga ra \u0f7f/ 
46a4(rgyud): yon tan 'dzin na thub par 'gyur// nyes pa rnams ni pas thub nyams// slob dbyin pa ni grad bsan// 'jig rten dgan che thang shing // de bzhan ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur// nya ba la sogs
46a5(rgyud): 'drin nyes kun 'byung gnas te// mkhas pas tha ma skur mi gad ba// chos 'dod dmas kyis slob dben la// rtag tu rkun du mnyes par bya// gangan rtsal ba'i sras gnas pa// sa des
46a6(rgyud): 'a bya yin// de ni lasras thams cad dang // bag ca meng las rkad pa yi// sprin breg las cid ma pa nyid // dpa' ba 'a la brjod pani/ sems can rnams la phan pa ga pa/ 
46a7(rgyud): gyon po rnams kyis sngon chad ba shad// sbyin sreg bya pa'i las rnams pa// gang gis 'di ltar nam shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// dngos gru myur du thob par 'gyur//

46b1(rgyud): chen po lagan ngo sa 'ja ma dpal gnan du shur bal 'di skad ces smras so// sang sa sngams pa sngags pa yi// dbang bzung kyi lang podzo par bya/ lpagadagacigagan pa

46b7(rgyud): khas pas rim pa gnyis pa bya// dbus kyi pad ma mdor brjod na// 'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa sa// 'dib mang bar bar thams cad du// rdo rje dgan bre bar bya// de dag la yang snying ba gri/

48b8(rgyud): nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang zhe na/ gang mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi ngor mi bsla ba dang po shes nas de'i ro myong ba dang don de shin du chung bas de las mi nyams pa dang brtan par gyur pa
49a1(rgyud): chos nyid do zhes pa sad 'dogs pa de ni man ngag bshad pa'o// de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsung ba de de bzhin te gzhan du mi
49a2(rgyud): bsnga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma sa don mi 'akru'o// de mngon par rtogs pa dang mngon snyam du byas pa dang 'bras bu thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// gzhan yang chos nyid des par
49a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rtsal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'azhed do// dkyil

49a5(rgyud): smin pa'i ngo bo'o// de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o// chos nyid de mngon sum du thob pa gang yin pa ni 'bras bu'o// 'bras bu gang yin pa de nam par smin pa'o// rnam par smin pa gang yin
49a6(rgyud): / de bo gang yin pa de tha skad du lhung ba'o// bskrad du ltung ba kang yin pa dang bskad kyi ngo bo gang ljin pa de ni btags pa'o// don bya ba'o// bya ba gang yin pa de las so// chos nyid gang yin pa de sa
49a7(rgyud): 'don par rtogs pa med mngon sum du bya ba med nam par byang ba med kyang las dang rnam par smid pa'i sal gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dmas
49a8(rgyud): / thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa dang rnam par bya nga ston to// gsung ngo brjod do 'dogs so// rab tu 'jog gi rnam par 'grel to 'chang ngo tshul bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so// 
49b1(rgyud): dpal gzha yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sal gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang 'jig rten pha rol ge khyab
49b2(rgyud): sabya ba dang rkab ces bya ba dang 'chi ba ces bya ba dang nad ces bya ba dang rgud pa zhes bya ba dang phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang 'dus byas/ shes bya ba dang 'dub mabyas zhes bya ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang

56a1(rgyud): d+h+waM hUM sA d+ha/ stobs po che'i sngags so// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+hags bathAg tag ta nodar+ya yun la ba lo ki ta badz+ra ma ra d+ha badz+raT+TA ShA/ hUM hUM pra dz+wa li ta mu ri d+harmA
56a2(rgyud): sngags so// namaHsa rba taklag te b+h+yaHsa su She T+Ta sa A hrIn+d+ra Sh+T+rIdz+dza/ ya du d+ha na mangs rba t+ya sa pra tita te b+ha ga ba te brdza ma tse bar hi hi li ni \u0f85\u0f7f/ de rtse mo'i sngags so// namaHsa rba te ga
56a3(rgyud): kyi po la ro/ yatam na na \u0f7fka n+teswAH/ depe ma gyi gas so// das gag lta su pacwa ba TI 'dzu na seM / do du
56a4(rgyud): lcags so// dmaHsa pa A ga te s+ya barba mu'i b+h+yaHsa rban te badz+ram la ni badz+ra pa Na le bad+ha nam reg sa/ rdorje phreng ba'i sngags so// mams su ga te ga yang ma'i byangasamapa tshul phun
56a5(rgyud): naH/  sa mangs so'i sngags sa// mams rnag sarnas pa 'i / ngongs po gsum pan gyi sngags
56a6(rgyud): dam saca dag b+h+ya san su b+h+yaHsarba r+b+ba rnalas sam thagapa tshugs ma'i po /  zugs pa'i sngags sa// namams tenag AHsa
56a7(rgyud): ga tesag tham ma thabs da kyi las su du zhug ta/  tshang sa te/ rdo saso// namaHma ca ga te rgyam sa su mas ca tum thab naka bang sudag
56b1(rgyud): rA/ rdo mo ba'i sngags so// da yas catan ga b+h+ya/ sarba mu e Sh+Ta sa ma badza nA kar ta na ga te thAn+dan gsu su coM wan nA tra/ rdo rje ba'i sngags so// namathas cadag ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe ldaHsams
56b2(rgyud): thAka ti'i skam b+ha badz+re kI la kI la kar swA hA/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu kha~M b+h+yaHsarba mA badz+ra pany+dzar ni kak+Shi ba ga ga na kha~M s+phA hA/ dong dra pa'i sngags so// namaHsarba taTA
56b3(rgyud): sarba suShe b+h+yaHsarba thA hA sa 'dra nga la dza la dA swA hA/ rdo rje bzhad ma'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra'i lAs la la ta a na nA swA hA/ rdo rje 'jo tshul gyi sngags so// nam
56b4(rgyud): kAka te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbathA tA thA ga ta nim+b+hi ra/ badz+rad rU b+hi ha sa swA hA/ rdo rje ngo che'i sngags so// namaHsa bta thA ga teb+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra ga sde b+ha ga pa ti n+dan sre sa ma b+hU te/ rIts+tsha
56b5(rgyud): dral bu'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu SheSh+ThaHsarba thA ba dra ro ma ma ni ni ri ti ni swA hA/ do rje su'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba nA badra phu la na khi shi li ni sA hA
56b6(rgyud): yin mo can gyi sngags so// numaHsarba ta thAgA teb+h+yaHAHsa She b+h+yaHsurbaT+TA Sha d+hA dwai hrI ba~M stsu gtsug d+ha ku ru ta thA ga tA Adz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje phog ma'i sngags so// na maHsarba!
56b7(rgyud): mAm su Sha b+h+yaHsarba d+hu brjod 'apa byung badz+ra shi/ Sho bo tsa ri sha ri rmA hA/ rdo rje mug tsug ga sngags so// na maHsarba ha T+wAM ga te b+h+yaHsarba su khe b+h+yaHsarba thA thAg pa ti 'adz+ra ka rA li
56b8(rgyud): ri \u0f7f/ rdo dzag ma mo'i sngags so// namaHsam ta nag te b+h+yaHsa mam chi'aHsa ma hA ba sag du la'ang snga na'i shA tsa su ru swAdz+dza/ rdo rjeg pa'i sngags so// nam
57a1(rgyud): ta bA ga teb+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbab badz+ra ra k+Sha si khAd ya sarba bA ta thA ga ta sa b+ha ba gam ka ti/ badz+ratsan swAhA/ doHsrin po'i sngags so// 
57a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsas su9b+h+yaHsarba thA ya/ mau byu lan n+yar/ sar+thag ces nas trAn nA tAthA ka ta saM gas ldan T+TaH/ de rje la gri'i sngags so// 
57a3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khek+ShaHsarba b+hU ta thA ga ta ko ShA saM b+ha ba b+hU tA shri brA b+ha swA hA/ rdo rje 'byung ba'i sngags so// ramaHsarba tathA ga te b+h+ya

57b8(rgyud): tathA ga teb+h+yaHsarba mu 9sarba thA ha la kun gu bar ba d+har/ d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ bid+ha ra kad+ha/ kad+hakaT+Ta/ badz+rang+ka ti/ badz+ra pri la ka ha ka ha han te/ 
58a1(rgyud): rA ya se sa hasab+hu dzas tes+tha/ yA na na banA dan+da/ du ra dAn+ta da ma ka pra dzA li ta ke shwan kha ro/ mad sha na da lai/ bin+dusmA ra ta dza hA/

58a3(rgyud): ran/ badz+ra pA tra/ badz+ra na du/ nI la ba dz+ra ba drag ta/ gaDa ba su kha ga ni gam+b+hI ra d+h+r-i ka ra/ ra ti ta sa ha ha si ta la ma bo dar kra sa kra sa pra'i sha yA \u0f7f
58a4(rgyud): Na g+hur+Na/ g+hur+N+Na pa ya g+hAr+NA pa ya/ sarba satwA/ b+hu ma b+h+yAm/ b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ ma tha ma rba hUM hUM/ badz+ra pA

59a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sngagasas// rnam b+h+ya san 9Sh+Ta/ sun rjir stsa pa//  ng+ge ba ni ngasaH/  ga mtshag ga rgyas kyi gas so// ma

59a6(rgyud): namaHsa ga ti bye/ sarbas 9b+h+yaHsarba ma bral la badz+ra d+ha pra r+d+haka saH/ sa dmi med pa'i sogs so// namachis d+hathAka ti/ sargyam b+h+yasapa
59a7(rgyud): rdo rje chags pa'i sngags so// na maHsarba thAg teHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba nas byasarba 'dre badz+ra wAm ga ra Na ma la sod/ rdo rjes 'jigs pa'i sngags
59b1(rgyud): ramaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba su lem+b+ha/ sarba thA sa ma pasti bzlas ma pa swAH/ rdo phun sum tshogs pa'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba twA thA ga t+ye thAH/ sarba mA khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA badz+ra kus pa
59b2(rgyud): swA hAta/ rdo rje gzhan nu'i sngags so// namaHsarba ta thA ga d+heH/ sarbas kheSh+TaHsarba thAk+kam bad+ma ba la si ni ta/ ki ti swAH/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje sgeg mo'i sngags so// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa
59b3(rgyud): b+h+yaH/ sarbaSh+Ta k+Sha ma ba da bi dud+ha ri ku mu ta swAH/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rig sngags 'chang ba'i stegs so// na maHsarbata zhag te/ 
59b4(rgyud): kanod sbyin mo'i sngags s+ho// namaHsarba ta thAg b+h+yaHsarba mu kheb+h+yaHsarba thA badz+rAn ta~M ke khi ri 'i grwa kha rika swAH/ rdo rje gdel ma'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga teb+h+yaHsarba mAchi/ 
59b5(rgyud): ta pra la/ ru ti be tA li/ li hi laH/ me mgo ni 'adz+ram be nor hi/ rdo rje khrag gi ro langs ma'i sngags sa// na maHsarba tathA ga teb+h+yaHsarba pra khe b+h+yaHsarba 'bre dra be tA li ka la

59b8(rgyud): san bdags su zhe ba kas d+ha/ drong sa ma'i sngags sa// mamaHsa ma ga ta b+h+ya/ sanas / san padz+ra pa la/ d+ham tog 'dzub ma

60a6(rgyud): sarba ta drag ste \u0f7fsarba mu lebaHsapa' badz+ra mi ka ting D+hama? khi rak+Sha a k+Shi ba tI katA kad+ha ma bi laMma?/ badra pA Ni A dz+nyA ba ya de swA hA/ pho nya mo rdo rjes ma'i sngags so// nA maHsarba tathA
60a7(rgyud): sa su kyiHsa rba badz+re drung ni tu d+ha / sa rad+ha ra swA tra/ pho nyis rdo 'chang ma'i sngagasas// namaHsa rba te thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu She b+h+yaHsarba thA bi drad+ha li ke drwa sa to// / 
60b1(rgyud): rnge / phon mo rdo rje nag mo'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta zhag te b+h+yaHsarba bu She b+h+yaHsarba thA thal babi ga li ta/ mahA ma Ni ku nAM sa sAd/ po nya skems par 'dug gi sngags so// na maHsa
60b2(rgyud): thAka te b+h+yaHsarba pra ShaSh+TaHsarba thA pra tsaN+Da badz+ra d+ha // naiR+Sha yed hA data/ b+h+yany+dzab+haT+Te/ sa ma la ma nu swa ra swA hA/ po nya rab gtum gyi sngags so// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba
60b3(rgyud): nopro la sarba satwA pa sha~M ka ri swA hA/ po nyi rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbe thA tsaN+Da mu khe kha kha khA hi
60b4(rgyud): dang gi sngags so// na maHsarba ti thA ga te b+h+yaHsam mkha/ sarba' bajug na rnyan dam ka pe ma la ma 'ang shing hi swAtA/ pho nyid rje dri ma med pa'i sngags so// namaHnag te

60b7(rgyud): 9b+h+ya sa thA bdod+ha mA staH/ nyid rna mchog go/ sngags so// namaHsa rba ta zhag te \u0f7fsam su la b+h+yaHsarba dzA bed+d+ha ThAkyA rAd+ha dwe ta At+ma/ shi rdo rjeg dong gi sngags so/ 
60b8(rgyud): / te b+h+yaHseb su'i kyi sarbatha brjid nur tsa po badz+ra na/ sel haha ra la dod d+ha / d+hU ba ra swAd+ha/ pa nye rdo rjes so'i sngags so// na maHsa rba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba su'o
61a1(rgyud): gla / nasasu / hA /  kum+b+ha r+b+ha smam rdzu sa

61a5(rgyud): ga brnyan rje dus che'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba tan sanas b+h+yaHsatwe thA bad+his la dka/  tA 'i seM// phyag brnyan / ban
61a6(rgyud): namangs rba tenag te b+h+yaHsarba mra khe b+h+yaHsarba b+hU ha Shi dz+nyAn+te/ sha~M man bAny+dzaka la ha~M la ni oM l-i la li ta du skyes mthaMd la sa twa/ b+hag bcan dadza' thab zed kyi sngags so// 
61a7(rgyud): dzas/ lul su la/ ha mr-i ta lus cu/ byeg brtan rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so// namaHsa cate nag te b+h+yaHsa sa ma la byaHsams tag
61b1(rgyud): drubadza ku la sun d+ha ra d+ha ra ha ra ha ra swA hA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje rigs mdzes kyi sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ha la ha la/ Tar rbang lun na badra kin
61b2(rgyud): 'arnyan rdo rje bung byed kyi sngags so// nu paHsarba t+ta thAg te baN+DasU rba mkhe hrIHsar+b+ba b+hA badrAta tany+dza la dza~M kar bA tan+ta m+b+ha hA/ byAk+Sha brtan rdo rje rlung las rgyal gyi sngags so// 
61b3(rgyud): sin mr-i khe lce sarbaT+Ta ko ti na nga pa/ kIny+tsir la sa b+h+r-i br-it+ta ka tI tid ti ga ta swAH/ phyag brnyan rje mtha' las rgyal gyi sngags so// na maHsarba te thAg teb+h+ya
61b4(rgyud): san thAtsa pa li ke tsa pa la badz+ra Ni sAhA/ bran mo rdo rje phyar mo'i sngags so// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA su badz+re Ni badz+ra du tI ke swA hA/ bran ma rdo rje lig
61b5(rgyud): so// nu maHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsArba mu She b+h+yaHsarba thA pa dz+ra bany+dza ri ke badz+ri ni pA hA/ bran mo rdo rje drab me'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga tu b+h+yaHsarba mu kha b+h+yaHsarba thA radam
61b6(rgyud): wi paT+TaH/ blan mdza rin chen thong ma'i sngags so// namAHsarbata thAg d+heH sarbam+b+hab+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra pA la ni dpal bre 'i bo dzA r+NaswAH/ bram mdza dkar po'i
61b7(rgyud): sarba mu'i b+h+yaHsarbeT 'dramam bi ke swAt+ma/ bran sa rdo rje 'byung ma'i sngags so// na madz+nyA sarba ta nAg te b+h+yaHbzo bu 'thuHsar+b+ba thA badz+re mug
61b8(rgyud): da li ti ki mAH/ phrin ma rdo rje sring rtse mo sngags so// namathas sa tashig te byam sa sa su e khya sem thA lu te r+tha ba dz+ra Ni ba dra ba Sha do lag me swAhA/ bran me rje legs
62a1(rgyud): sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra du ku la b+hak+She shu ha ra ni swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje dug ku le'i ras can gyi sngags so// na maHsa
62a2(rgyud): ga te byu sa nam la/ sa na ba kA le ke ba rdeka swAH/ bran mo mnyam pa mo'i sgrogs so// na maHArba thAg te/ seM ba s+ho la \u0f7fsa sa badz+ra la kA n+d+ha badz+nyA
62a3(rgyud): phrin mo dza rdo rgyal byed ma'i sngags so// namangs ca ga te b+h+yaHsa ma kheSh+TaHsarbA badz+ra ka dA badz+ra.a na na~M ka swAH/ bran med rje bsngags ma'i sngags so// na
62a4(rgyud): tathAg teHsarba su la b+h+yaHsarbaH badra bA tsA N+Di badz+ra ba ti ka~M swAt+ma/ bran mo rje gsod byed kyi sngags so// namangs rba tazhag
62a5(rgyud): ribadz+ra ga na d+hi ra satwa/ bran pa dang tshig 'dzin gyi sngags so// namaHsarba tathAg teb+h+yaHsarbas/ khe \u0f7fsa rba sa me cig dab sa ga~M yis rba barba pA NI da ku ru swA hA/ rig pa'i
62a6(rgyud): legs par grub byed kyi sngags so// namaHsa rba tethAg tAk+Shasarba pra kha rbad+hA ra t+nam+ba la~M badz+ra na da/ mi rgyal po na rten dbu rgyan rtsegasam ga sngags so// nams
62a7(rgyud): teb+h+ya/ sarba tu \u0f7fsarba thA bid+yod+ha ma niH badra d+he/ rig pa'i rgyal po rig po mchog gi rdzogs so// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu be b+h+yaHsarba thA pa la kI la~M ki la bdam bu na
62a8(rgyud): /  pa sa / nam sa [] rdzog pan sa/ sa \u0f7f/ rig pa rgyal ma
62b1(rgyud): sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bu khe b+h+yaHsarba nA su rba pa ma la bajus tu nyi ka AhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so// nab bas rba tan ga te byaHsa rba Sha b+h+yaHsarba thA
62b2(rgyud): gta 'adz+ra da ra swA hA/ reg pa'i rgyal po dang thogs pa'i sngags so// na maHsa rba ta thA ga te byams rba m+b+ha d+has \u0f7fsa rba la li ta ba dbu du mang sak+Sha ru ba d+ha ras ra sa bAH/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdong rol pa'i sdug
62b3(rgyud): \u0f7fsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ga dza kar+Na badz+ra lo tsa naM tsan tsa la kA swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba tA thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA tra Ta badz+ra kany+tsa hUM swAhA/ 
62b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thASh+Ti Sha na badz+ra b+hU ma/ badz+ra pA Nir a drA pa ya ti swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po bsdims su rung gi sngags so// na maHsarba tany+dza
62b5(rgyud): rba mu khe b+h+yaHsa thA ha ri te/ sarba tra me pra ti ha ta/ tar ta ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA hA sa badz+ra d+ha ra sra ta nu/ sarba artas
62b6(rgyud): te swA na/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje ba ga pa'i sngags so// phyag rdo rje dbang bsrung ba'i rlud las/ bam po lngag/ de sa yang lagan rdo rje yan lag thams cad 'thung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
62b7(rgyud): / ti dpe de'i mthus bu ngalas skyes pa' nas byung ba dag yid dang lan la ga thams cad las nyung ngo // de la lag pagunyis las ni gzhon nu la ga babang ngo // kha na rA ni kAn
62b8(rgyud): dadupyod pa nasas ni gnod du rjor pa no// sdigatsug las ni gzhon dusazus to// de rjeb tog rnam salas zhi jug no du rtsotan no/ rdorjepa nyig tho ma bzhin no rgya
63a1(rgyud): rdo byung las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i brang ngo // rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon du rdo rje mug go// rdo rje dpral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o// rdo rje srin ma las ni gzhon nu du 'i ma
63a2(rgyud): nu ba las nI ga zhonan rdo rje 'chang ngo // rdo rje theg las ni gzhon rdo rdo rje 'jig rten mig gcig pa'o// rdo sA las ni gzhon nu drong shugs 'chang ngo // rdo rje khur chos las ni gzhon nu
63a3(rgyud): rje ma 'bang ba'i gzi brjid do// rgya 'anas nI gzhon nu ngo nga gnya' shing 'dzin to// de ltar de dag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rje'i bu kazhon nu khro bo dag lagan rdo rje thags
63a4(rgyud): na gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa snying rje'i dkyil 'khor las yang dag par byang ba la gan dro rje'i smon lam gyis ning drangs pa'ajig rten gyi khrims bdad pa rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa
63a5(rgyud): pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ting ding dag nas dang rnam par thar ba dang sa dang pa rol du phyin pa dang stobs dang byung chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i la mi dang stong pa nyid chen pos
63a6(rgyud): par bskyed pa sems can thams cad kyi bsas pa 'ongs sa rdzogs par byed pa la gnas myong du yang thugs s+ho// den gas ba pa'i bad po lag dadang ting nga 'di las ya
63a7(rgyud): pa/ namal ga gas sa su byas pa ldanas sa// la#
63b1(rgyud): badz+ra bcu shu rigs swA hA/ dza rje lag bzang gisags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mra'i kuHsa rba kyi latshwa shi yang badz+ra shi kha bil d+hi ta ta sAr+tha/ ngo rje me tog thod kyi sngags so/ 
63b2(rgyud): baHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaSh+Tasarba praShe b+h+yaHsarba thA ki ri badz+ra d+ha ri/ bi gud d+ha / oM gar swA hU~M/ rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so// ne maHsa nyan ga teHsar+b+ba pu b+h+yaHsarba thA ba dz+ra su ma gau ta/ hUM
63b3(rgyud): gtsug nas byung ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu le b+h+yaHsarba thA ku sum/ a tsi ta badz+ra sa rdi ba draswa thA bsA / rdo rje ma tog gi sngags so// na maHsarba ta thAg ta baH
63b4(rgyud): sarba dzA badra bar d+har// phu bded ta ma swA d+ha/ rdo rje phreng gi sngags so// namaHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu lA b+h+yaHsarba thI badra brang la badz+ra Ni pri ya sa tra hi ta ka ra sA twa/ gzhon nu rdorje sdug gi
63b5(rgyud): / namaHsirba ta thAg ta b+haHsarba pu lab+h+yaHsarbany+dza tsan+d+ra badz+ra a~Mg sun b+ha swA hA/ gzhon nu rje zla ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba badz+re tsakra maN+Da las rba taH
63b6(rgyud): dz+nyAn/ gzhon du rdo rje sbyin ma'i sngags so// namams rbata thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu'i byeHsarba thA badra ma~M ri sh+'ud+ha d+ha b+ha narbad swAhA/ derje rnam chog 'chang gi sngags so// na maHsa rba ta thA ga Ne
63b7(rgyud): sarba thA ba dra lo tsan dran tsak+Shu rba da swAhA/ rdo rje mig gi sngags so// na maHsa rbata nAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra bi gad+ha ri/ ma nong badz+rar d+ha ra mA hA/ rdo rje zhugs 'chang gi sngags sa
63b8(rgyud): dmaHsarba ta thAg te skye sarba su ma bya sa pa cwa lu d+ha ba rdzas ma lam dulal ba swA hA/ rdo rje rjer gyi rdzogs so// namaHsa rba ta thAka te byaHsarba su rgyan barban brji d+ha d+har dz+wa li ta ma cis
64a1(rgyud): rdo rjeg ces pa 'dzin bya sngags so// namams ca thA ka/ b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pra la d+haHsang na bang ma ku brdzu ga dus ngas patwAt+ta/ rdo rnam che ba'i sngags so// na thas
64a2(rgyud): sas thA sa sa rnas pa d+hA brnyan kyil ba Sh+T+rISh+ThaH/ dong klu migs so//  sa nag sa na pa rnarna ma ti ba d+h+wan N+Da ba ts+tshaH/ kAn
64a3(rgyud): pa'i sngags so// na maHsa rbata zag d+he b+h+yaHsarba sul \u0f7fsarba tad a ba la m+bI bi ta s+'u d+hi d+hak+Shad+hagasan/ gogon nu rje gnyi shing 'dzin gyi lcags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
64a4(rgyud): cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa las nang rje rdo rje las yang dag par byung bsangs cam dang byung chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma sngam ting nge 'dzin la dbang skur cing / gnod pa thams cad
64a5(rgyud): lus sru chen po'i phred gas padag tum byed bya bar 'dag gi zhes brjod pa'i skabyung ngo // nams catathA ga r+dz+dza / sasam te bad+ma nI lon padram ti sa na thum pa
64a6(rgyud): kuH/ gang / thAklu/  sa smra // ma mas gsaso// ma ta gar+dz+dza pa
64a7(rgyud): rim ba tsam sa/ rdo meng po'i dzin gyi lags so// namamamam tha sa te bye samasu 'i byaHsa can 'angs tu brjid paHsa na/ de jigadags gar pa'i sngags so// 
64b1(rgyud): A b+h+yaHsa rba mra khe b+h+yaHsarban pa ta t+ta ma hA badz+ra ba na dag rigs la swAt+ma/ rdo rjerjen chen bdan chen po'i sngags so// nams rba ta thAg taSh+ThaHsams b+h+yaHsarba thAr NA swAH/ dA li ta badz+ra
64b2(rgyud): hA/ rdo rje khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so// na maHsarba twa thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badz+ra pad+mo d+ha ba/ badz+ra As nab dran dad swA hA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so// na maHsarbat+ta
64b3(rgyud): \u0f7fsam grA Sheb+h+yaHsarba thA skr-i ta~M/ badz+rad+harakAswA t+ma/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so// namaHsarba tathAg tiSh+Tha sarba ma khaSh+TaH sarba thA bi d+hi ba~M b+ha tan badrabam pa ma swA hA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags
64b4(rgyud): moHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA bI ma ti ha da ka/ ba dz+ra rat+na d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ rdo rje yid gnyis rnam par gcid par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba

64b7(rgyud): thal gyi sngags so// namaHsa tsa tek+Sha me t+tab+h+yaHsa b+h+ya na shU hA badz+rasar+b+ba A/ rje stong ba nyid kyi sngags so// namaHsa catanag b+h+yaHsarba mas nas
64b8(rgyud): sam hA pra bka ba dz+ras tra sAH/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi sngags so// namaHsa cha thug te b+h+yaHsa pa mu She b+h+yaHsarba thA ga ga na gany+dza ni ta shi sha la mkham pa dz+riswA hA/ rdo rje nam mkha' ma
65a1(rgyud): //  g+sa k+ShaHsa b+h+ya sa nas 'jug tu ba da mi mas panan ma nis/ rdongagand rgyun mo dgas so//
