220a8(rgyud): 'og tu na de bzhin du bgags thams cad char gcod pa'i g.yog ma mtha' yas zhes bya ba bri'o// phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa pa phyag 'tshal babri bar bya'o// yang na ras ris ni ji lur 'dod pa de
220b1(rgyud): rgya hU~M la mthas pam ldan 'ad rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'arnams kyi gzugs kyi snyun mtha' yas pa man byor chog pa dang ldan na thabs la mkhas parnams cas rnams
220b2(rgyud): chog med pa'am/ mtshang ba med par yang 'grub bo// gsang sngags kyi sgong smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rig pa mchog gi hral po bsdus pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho// / de nas gas
220b3(rgyud): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bstan pa don yod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar de banin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yum tu mtsho nam mkha'i spyan
220b4(rgyud): 'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gcig tu rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nam mkha'i sku
220b5(rgyud): des bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal moHma mchodag 'di ska thams cad las gsungs so// namaHs+t+rai ya nI kAraM/  twA na/ maM ga zhan la nan/ gaganas ma/ sapa thA oM ga tA tI sa sa~M b+ha badz+ra lda na mo
220b6(rgyud): 7/ lag na ngo rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyin mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyed yul las yang dag par byung ga byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa'i yum/ mtha yas pa thog
220b7(rgyud): med 'don yod par grub pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la rab tu sbyor bar gnas pa'o// 'di 'dzin par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu ni phyir mi ldog
220b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// bzlas pa nyid kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa mnyam pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// bas bapa byas na de bzhin gshegs
221a1(rgyud): // thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sa la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dini pal sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ma
221a2(rgyud): pa don yod pa 'dis tshegs chung ngus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas da ni rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu byang
221a3(rgyud): chub sems dpas chos gcig nas brtsams nas/ dang por shig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o// dbul ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ bdag
221a4(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba spangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis dus thams cad du sdug
221a5(rgyud): babadag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// yongs su bdud du gsol// yongs su bslab du gsol zhes brjod do// de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
221a6(rgyud): thugs bskyed gang gis bshags pa'i sems bskyed pa des dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa thams cad bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bshags
221a7(rgyud): 'o zhes bya ba'am/ nub pa 'i lta ba bzhin du bshegs par bya'o// thams can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi khams rnam par spong bar byed pa'i dus gsu
221a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi chags rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/ ci ltar sangs chas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pade
221b1(rgyud): bzhin du rjes su yi rang zhes bya ba 'am/ nus pa ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa na bdag gi med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa thang dang chu las
221b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / rtsa mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pas mtshad pa'i thabs la gams par byas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la dngul
221b3(rgyud): yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgya che zhing gya nom pa mchad pa'i sprin rab 'byam rnams bdag gi smon lam dang / bsod nams
221b4(rgyud): spobs dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis so sor 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ de lta bu'i mchod nga chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo
221b5(rgyud): na mo'adayang lan brgyad kyobar du bdod par du'o// namathas pa bud+d+ha ba d+him t+ta nA~M/ sa sa/ yud tel Ni ti mi gzhana'i sam tu ste ma dad pa kazhan ma yin par mchod pa rnams de bzhin dayang dag par
221b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsnganas pa rgya mtsho spobs pa'i dbyangs raba'i byas rnams kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings su/ 
221b7(rgyud): grags pa 'jug par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'dz+war la rjes su 'dug par gyur cig/ mdo sde'i tshul rab tu sgrogs pa gyur cig ces bsams la// bstod pa dang bsngags pa sku
221b8(rgyud): byed la chos thams cad kyi sbyin mi par 'bebs par byed pa'i dzin pa tshan mchi sa ma ma pa na 'byed kyi brjod par byab/ rnamams na/  sus smras gyi

222a4(rgyud): sel sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa'i bar du gyur cig ces tshig tu brjod pa'am/ brtsams la de lta bu'i sprul pa chen po mngon par bslab par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad

222b2(rgyud): spya rnams ci ga gas pa pa na bzhin gshegs pa sa sbyin gyim nga byung ba gyu ga sa da ba yi sa rnas pa ma pabya'o// ya de bzhin pa shegs pas pachags pa

223a1(rgyud): chan tha'i sprin mngon par bslab pa sprul pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin lam chos kyi char gyi rkun 'bab par ba tu gnas par bya ba'am/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gzung

228a1(rgyud): ba ra ba ra/ dad ya~M kur/ ar+tha sid+d+hi/ dz+wa la na maHa pra ti ha to/ Sh+NISh+Tha NAM/ ma ti a ti swA hA// sangs mas thams cad kyi gtsug ter dang gzhan dag las kyang thogs pa
228a2(rgyud): katsug tor gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs pan mtha' yas shing yangs pa'i ngamatshar blang bas thams cad g.yas par gyur to// danas shar phyogs lags nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnga' ya
228a3(rgyud): drim med pa zhes bya bas de bzhin du 'od kyi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i reg sngags 'di gsungs shing thos par gyur to// namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a gra bi ma le/ namaHa kra Shi maN+Da le nam
228a4(rgyud): yakra swA namaHsid+d+ha a gral gnasaHiHla ma bal ma bran maHdzA ma la/ d+hun d+hun/ do/ Na gta/ krAta g+ha ta/ gi tshan sa b+h+rUM oM br-i tig te b+h+ya swAt+ma/ gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i ga
228a5(rgyud): rtse mo zhes bya ba'o// stang gi phyogs log ca nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsa'i snying rjes brgyan pa zhes bya bas kun tu bzhad pa'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa'i mchog mdzad nas rtse mo 'di gsungs shing
228a6(rgyud): /  ba sa / [] ai/ seM marbAH/ sa mra ya na/ sardzum // sa / 
228a7(rgyud): ri d+hi ri/ a gri tar a gri tar/ na mo a gra g+hAHta thA ga te b+h+ya d+hisatwe Sh+ThaHsmar Na ga gan bden d+ha/ snying rje bdud rtsi rtse mo'i dam tshig ces bye ba'i gtsug tor ro// yang gtsug tor gsum
228a8(rgyud): ba ba'i rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'din la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rtse mo'i rtse mo 'dirab tu
228b1(rgyud): / rab tu thob nas gsungs pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha ba d+hi satwA nAM/ tri shrI khA/ a gran mo sa s+ye/ sa man+ta sha man+ta/ a gra guN a tsa la a kra d+harma te/ bi d+hun hI ShA shA tA/ duHkha dz+ra yo ga ra ta/ sarba su khaM dang
228b2(rgyud): shAn+ta da~M tri sa ma ye ku ru swA hA/ rtse mo'i rtse mo ches rtse mo// sems can kun gyi don byed ni// kun nas yon tan mtha' yas pa// sras dang bcas pas gsungs par gyur// de nas bla na med pa sogs
228b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs can rnams kyis thun mong gi cho ga la 'jug pa bshad par bya'o// thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis
228b4(rgyud): bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rab tu byed par 'dod pas chos gcig nas brtsams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ba dang / snga
228b5(rgyud): na du sdig pa bshags par bya'o// nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sems can tham
228b6(rgyud): cad yongs su smin par ma dad pal rjes su yo rang bas rjes su yi nga ngo // de bzhin du bdag gi bsod nams kyis bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob bar mdzad
228b7(rgyud): byung bar 'gyur ba 'grub par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar bya zhing / byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes brjo la/ dben zhing stong pa'i gnas rnams su sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la goms par bya'o// mi
228b8(rgyud): par gyur na dam pa'i chos bklags par bya'o// 'du 'dzi spangs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag 'tshal nas bzlas pa la goms pas bzlas pa bya ba2/ num
229a1(rgyud): // de kha zhin du mas gcig nas brtsams nas na' bar du zlas sa nas zla ba na matan thamam pa bkram pa'i dkyil 'bar byas nas macan thag ga zlas pa byas na/ dpanan san/ 
229a2(rgyud): na sa da nan /  yin 'gas pal 'byung sh+tsa ma/ sngags kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yang mas par 'gyur/ 
229a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong na slar yang zla ba gcig na mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u 'i cho ga 'am/ rig pa mchog gi
229a4(rgyud): tog pa gzhan gyi tshig 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs dang / thogs pa med pa don yod ra thub pa'i chos
229a5(rgyud): nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dir sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces bsams nas bzlas na/ de nas gzhan mo yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rlabs kyis yang
229a6(rgyud): dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag la phan pa ying 'byung bar 'gyur ro zheb dad par yang bya'o// don da pa 'dir ya chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dngos gru nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang de bzhin
229a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mkhyen par 'gyur ro// bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur nang / yon tan mtha' yas pa'i bdad rtsid kho na nyid rab tu 'thob cing yongs su
229a8(rgyud): spyad pa thams cad la 'phrogs pa med pa'i grogs dang bcas pas 'gro bas sam/ ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshe las bsgrub par bya'o// mdonan mtshan gcig gis kyang rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ skyil
229b1(rgyud): klum bshig par de bzhin gshegs pangs su dran pas ma rtog gi nim pa bkram pa'i dkyil 'khar la zhugs pa'adam mchos kyi glag pabam rgya mdun du mtshan thag zag bzlas na des ngas par
229b2(rgyud): 'i cha rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// las gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lha dgug pa ni yangs kar dang mar gyis so// klu dgug pani mar dang skang rtsis 'asres pa dang po ba ris kyis so// gnod sbyin dgug
229b3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi can gyi me tog mar gyis bsgos pa dang til mar gyis bsgos pa'i sngags mdud kyis so// rig pa 'dzin pa la ni til mar gyis bsgos pa'i yungs kar gyis so// rgyal po dgug pa la ni mar gyis gang
229b4(rgyud): sreg gis te/ me tog dang bcas pa bsreg par bya'o// skyes pa dbang du bye ba la ni nor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis so// bud med dbang dbya ba la ni bri yang klu 'i me tog spang rtsis bsgos pa'i sreg par bya'o// 'tsham
229b5(rgyud): bral bas ci ltar 'dod par nges par bsgrub par bya ste/ thun mong gi sbyor ba yin no// 'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das gser gyi mdog can skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ spyi gtsug nas byung ba'i 'od
229b6(rgyud): dA kyis steng du 'od bar gyi phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor can bri bar bya'o// g.yas su 'phags pa phyagan rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba pad+mal bzhugs pa 'od kyi phreng bcan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis
229b7(rgyud): shin tshog can smos dmar ba/ lag dang shAng ba dan ga/ ral pa dang bcas gtsun dang thal ga/  myur ba byas po// pad+ma mar ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i rnam 'o// de'ig tu
229b8(rgyud): can 'dul ba zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma khros pa/ skal kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gnag cing ldang ba/ ral ba gcig yod pa/ maug dur zhig dmar 'bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bog ni rmab pa byag
230a1(rgyud): 'bri bar bya'o// 'dir pa tshad ni de dag nyid yin no// mid la gang 'dod pas kyang rung ngo // ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo pad+ma la gnas pa ral ba thar du bshal ba'o// mngag gzhug pa gtum men ni gno/ 
230a2(rgyud): dun 'greng bar bri bar bya'o// bcug tor rab byam gyi rim par phye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i sge gtsug nas kun nas ril pa yangs shing mche ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sngags 'di lta bu
230a3(rgyud): / e shrI an+ta/ a gra u gra swAhA/ nA maHsarba bud+d+ha ba d+hi satwA nAM/ a ma la a gram yin mo sta a gra tsaM u bi Sha ye shi khi nI swAhA/ na maH
230a4(rgyud): tsad+hi satwA naM/ amr-i ta Ad+ha Sha ShA ma/ oM grad+ham te/ na ma~M T+Tad+d+he/ hrId+d+hitrA~M bI ri swA hA/ namaHsarba prats+tsha ba~M d+ha satwA nA~M/ dri sa ma ya/ bi la ya~M/ dzaM shwa khA ya gra h+NA ba kin+ti a m+b+ha ak+Sha a
230a5(rgyud): ma hA shai kha~M swA hA/ namaHsarba bud+ha bo d+hi sad+hanAM/ a kra ut+tar oM gr-i pa~M Sha ye maHswAhA/ spyi gtsug 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang kun tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yan tan
230a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi nang du gyung ba/ sems can gyi khams rnams rnam par spang bar byed pa bsgrub par bya'o// sngags chen pa'iben med pa'i yon tan la yang dang par byas nas bslabs na las thams cad de bzhin
230a7(rgyud): du byed par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi khyad par ni lha mo gser gyi mdog can rgyan dang dral ba ral ba'i cod pan 'dzin pa pi bar bya'o// 'og tu smrig tsug gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ma lag pa g.yon
230a8(rgyud): nazhags pa/ g.yas kyis rdo rje 'phyar ba/ khros pa/ ral pa gcig yod la/ gnag cing ldang ba/ mas dmar ba/ de bzhin du rin po che'i brag la gnas pa bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o// smi gtsug
230b1(rgyud): 'byas kyi rim par phye ba'o// de nas yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od thar kyi sprul ba zhes bya ba kun na sa ma lus pa'i 'od zer gyi mdod ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin rab 'byam pra ba// zhing sngags 'di skams/ 
230b2(rgyud): na drum d+hisatan/ a hA da sam ma/ tidaM na/ dz+wA la ya tA la ya dz+wal la/ mai hA bA ka/  shrI d+h+ya mad+ham/ birnam mi rnam/ mr-in ti sa bar+N+Na/ nas+yAH/ rig pa'i rgyal tsho'i rtse mog N+DI
230b3(rgyud): shi shi ri/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bi ma le/ d+hun d+hu na/ sam te ra tuta/ nA mA saM tsan+tan+te spar s+phar drA nA a ma le swA hA/ rig pa
230b4(rgyud): chedas 'bar yanas bya ba yin no// nams /  ya/ shAta m+b+ha pras ma ya/ a shrinI la yul sa/ be ts+tshin+da ne shIn+da/ ti tir a sa he as he/ sam sam/ bAr te

230b6(rgyud): bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i rtse ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ci snyed du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'o bar 'ongs nas mi bor babs nas yid la gang 'dod pas sam/ des nges parak+Sha
230b7(rgyud): kyi mdog can gser gyi 'od zer gyi dkyis le bar gyis brgyan pa'i rig pa dzina'i 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa 'gro 'a'adis las thams cad la sngam bzhin du/ ra bzhin de bzhin gshegs
231a1(rgyud): / ba' le'u la tshig 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pas sam/ rig pa mchog gi tshogs sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyis tshogs kyang bsgrub par bya'o// don yod pa mi zad pa rmad du byung bar 'dod par bya ba'i dngos
231a2(rgyud): brgyad yangs shing mi zad pa 'khrul pa med pa'o// gzi brjid rab 'byam rim par phye ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i thig le zhes bya ba kun tu nam mkha'i spyod yul gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge la
231a3(rgyud): mos par zhugs nas sngags 'di smras so// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA na~M/ ga gno pa me/ na ma ya a gra nI swAhA/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+heHdz+nyA ma a ma le a nanA ma d+h+ye tra hrIHsarba satwAM duHkha tI dam/ saH
231a4(rgyud): sanA ya/ anan+ta/ a tsa la ku NA swA hA/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+ha satwA nA~M/ u ti u da ra/ a gra d+harma tAM/ badz+ra ba~M si rA NI su khi sa da a sa yaM yaM b+ha baM he hi me ge d+hi a grig ma de ma na man+ta pa ra ra de a kr-i
231a5(rgyud): sam sa ma/ a sa ha a sa ha/ tA ya~M twA ye/ d+hun d+hA na/ oM sa man+ta/ sarba bi Sha ye/ a ha na a ha na/ t+yAM shi ni taM/ sa ma ya mo sta gan+d+ha nAM swAhA/ snying po'i dkyil 'khar gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig
231a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i rtse mo yin no// nAmaHsa bu pa~M d+hi sa nA~M/ a sa me a sa me/ a sa he a sa he/ tsA la ni bi sha d+ha ya/ a gri tri la ka~M/ si man+ta to// namaHsa man+ta/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a gra d+ha ma te swA hA/ na maHsa
231a7(rgyud): bud+d+ha oM d+hi satwA nAM/ a ti d+ha ra a mradz+nyAn/ 1ham hA gu Na t+tar/ a nan+ta sa man+ta ma car tsir/ man+ta ba li swA hA/ sngags kyi skyed pas bsgom pa y-i// rtse ma rnam pa mchog 'di de// gsungs pan
231a8(rgyud): bo thams cad kyis// ma lus par ni byin gyis rlob// sngar gyi chag rnams kyis 'di la sbyang bar bya'o// yid la gang 'dod pa'i chags sam/ to/ zhan gyi tshogs kyang sbar bar bya'o// 
231b1(rgyud): khya dngar ni del sogs pa dben nang stong par spangs ma'i khabs dang / dus gsum du khrus dang gtsang sbra byed cing na par yul yang bas bzlas pa la goms par bya ste/ ci srid du rdzu bkral gyi rkang pa thob pa da
231b2(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur kI bar du'o// rgya mtsha'i nang du zhug sa nas ci srid mngon par shes pa lnga thab kyi bar du brta/ sa pa bya'o// kun tu rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o// de nas lag na rdo rjed
231b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba sangs rgyam rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam gyi spyod yul la rnam par lta zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i
231b4(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa 'di smras so// de la dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba'i dkyil la bar chen po 'di 'di ltar ba'abyung ste/ mnges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i phyag rgya bcing ma la shin tu rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba
231b5(rgyud): ba med pa/ bla na med pa 'phags pa'i spyod yul de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'di yin no// de la re shig dang por gzhan dag mos pa bskyed par bya zhing / byang chub sems pa'i las kyi phyir gsol pa gdang
231b6(rgyud): 'am/ bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar 'dod pas bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang por sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing seng ldeng gi phur bus brkos la dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar mkho ba rnam
231b7(rgyud): bsog par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta badz+ran+da hUM a kro ta ya/ sa he ma hA tsan+ta l+li hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba tra rak+Sha Na d+h+wa dzaT rbaT/ ma n+dan+da TA phaT/ de nas chos bco lnga'am/ bcu gsum la da
231b8(rgyud): ba'i sa las su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshan ci lnga'i byams sem/ dri yis bsgos pa'i pir gyis kyang rung / chen gzhan yang rung / than ma la bas kyang bri bar bya'o// grub ni ci sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i
232a1(rgyud): kyil la mkhru lnga panas da can 'dod pa'i bar sngags 'dun pa shing bri bar bya'o// namaH larba bud+d+ha ba d+has twA nAM/ a ma la a ma la/ hUr g+hA nan+ta/ shA shA ta sarba dz+nyA nA ya sha na
232a2(rgyud): dam ma daM du/ a ti a ta ra ba ra a r+g+haM pa ma sarbatwA a nAM/ tIt+te me badz+rA pa d+hA a rar/ a samA sa ma/ sa mam+ba inan+ta/ d+him te khaN/ gaN/ ma hA bI raM/ a tsal-i sum sa ma/ a sa tim+b+ha b.lI/ 
232a3(rgyud): mahAr a ra gre kA hA ha ha ta/ badz+ra badz+ra a~M ka me/ d+hi d+ha rau/ hU~M hU~M sa~M da ma~M/ saM ma bA la/ a wa bi kra me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru saH thA/ sa rba ti dz+wa la dz+wa la/ a gre ya gr-ini hU~M raT phaT swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal
232a4(rgyud): rje ma 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pa yin no// 'di bzung ba tsam 'am/ bzlas pa tsam gyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grung 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags dngad gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di da
232a5(rgyud): zhin gshegs pa'i mdun du stong bzlas na gsang sngags thams cad bzlas pa 'bum bya ba par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'dis byed par 'gyur ro// sngags
232a6(rgyud): 'di brjod ci dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi bri bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khar las khru tshom gyi phy-i la byang gi sgog nos pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de'i nang gi dkyil 'khoro la phyag rgya 'phru
232a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong shar phyogs su gru gsum gyi gzugs dang / gru bzhi pa'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa bri bar bya'o// zla ba dang nyi ma ni dkyil du'o// de la sangs rgyas
232a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sngags ni 'di yin te/ namaHsarba bud+d+ha ba d+his twA nA~M/ a marba thA sarbatwa NA ke sA hA/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i sdigs so// na maHsa man+ta dAnA~M/ sa ma sa ma ma hU~M/ namaHsa man+ta badz+nyA nAM/ as
232b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gams su byang chub thams dpa'i phyag tu phrabar bya ste/ yo 'ashin gyi myong bu rgyal can gyi phyug kyimam ra rgyangangam gnas pa'o// denas kyang chub sams dang sngan san
232b2(rgyud): 'di yin te/ namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi pad+hA nA~M/ ma hA kA ra Na a to maN+Da le swA hA/ yid bzhin gyi nang bu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// namaHsa rba bud+d+ha bod+ha satwA nA~M/ ma hA can a mr-i te dz+wA la pA la swA hA/ de'i rjes
232b3(rgyud): thogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khar ral bri'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chur ngu la gnas pa'o// de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no// na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+hi satwA nI/ madz+ra mA dza a mA la swAt+ma/ ral gri'i phyag rgyad
232b4(rgyud): sngags sa// naHsarba bub+hA ba~M d+hi sanAM/ mahA badz+rod+ha dAnA ma d+ha na/ de nas de'i rnas tshogs la dam tshig rdo rje ladud dkyil lab chung dul gnas pa'o// de'i rig 'ani 'di yin no// nam sa
232b5(rgyud): satwA nAM/ ma hA bi r+yA a tsa la/ smar dz+wA la nA hUM/ mdung gi phyag rgya dang sngags so// na maHsa man+ta ba dAn+ti/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+red+b+ha ba tI/ byang shar mtshams su rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba dkyil 'khor chung ngul
232b6(rgyud): 'i g.yon phyogs su dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dkyil labar chung ngu la gnas 'o// de'i sngag sa ni 'di yin no// namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ sa man+ta ma d+hu a ma~M laM gu Na a tsal bi sho d+ha ka na ma te/ 
232b7(rgyud): rna/ kun ku ru/ nam ma/ rtun dun/ ga ga ga/ hata ta/ tra ya tra ya/ dA la dz+wa la swAH/ namaHsa man badz+ran/ ma N+Dab la rna la sa hA/ de'i rjes pags la rdo rdza na thams cad kyi rje'i dbyem g.yomam
233a1(rgyud): la gnas pa ma gal ba zhes bya ba'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsam du brtan/ ma hA badz+ra anan+ta/ bral sam ye/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// namaH
233a2(rgyud): man+ta badz+nyA nAM/ ma hA badz+ra anan+ta te dzA sA d+hA ra hUM/ de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba'i lcags kyu'i phrag rgya'i dkyil 'khor chung ngul gnas pa'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin no// na
233a3(rgyud): sa man+ta bad+mA nA~M/ ma hA badz+ra anan+ta te dz+wa sA d+ha ya hUM/ ka la ka la/ sa man+ta a nan+ta/ di Sha ya at+pA ta/ d+ha ma te dz+wa la nA ma sra s+thi d+ha ne d+ha na/ han ha na/ ma hA bi ka me swA hA/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang sngags
233a4(rgyud): na maHsa mAn+ta 'ang+kaH/ ma hA TI ga Ar ShA me/ in la a h+ye br-ih+NaswA hA/ lho gar mtshams su rdo rje da m+b+ha bucoM// de'i sdug pa ni 'di yin no// rnamamahA a tsal a tsal/ kuru
233a5(rgyud): 9/  ma d+ha la/  hU~M man/ de rje 'i dang sngags so// namaHsa man+ti / ba ba la yiHya /  ta 5/ gas sru bum sa bcom
233a6(rgyud): 'i sngag rgya gru bzhi pa pad+mal gnas pa/ srung bzed dang / chos gis kyi dbus na gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni bcom ldan ldan kyi sngags so// na maHsarba bud+d+ha ba~M d+hi sarbat+ta/ a ma
233a7(rgyud): sem la an d+hi ga tsu min ma rbu ti/ ma hA \u0f7f can / 48ha8/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ anan te// A sa mAn a sam/ ras r+b+ba'i m+b+ha mahA'i rdzasarba ru m+b+hahA/ rgyas gas kyi phyog rgya dang sngags/

255a6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i ral gri dang / ldong chos la sogs pa la bslab par bya'o// sems cad du yid mi bde pa dang bral bas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya zhing ldegs pa dang bcas pas

255b1(rgyud): yong ba mas rnams nges par 'ag // 'phags pa kun rgyabab pos de bzhin ga shegs pa rjes su dran zhing gsang sdugs smras pa/ rnam s+t+rai sa n+te kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA ne/ oM a s+t+ra par b+ho gr-i swA hA/ 'dis
255b2(rgyud): sa 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog par byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob gi/ 
255b3(rgyud): pa'i spyan gyi chog nyid kyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// das ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// ga zhon du mchog gi thugs nan ma zhes bya ba
255b4(rgyud): ltar lda ba thal mo sbar ba byas pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin thal mo sbyar ba/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i 'og tu sgrub pa pa bri bar bya ste/ lha mo la mngon du phyogs pa'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni 'phags
255b5(rgyud): kun tu 'azang ba rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs su spro ba/ ral ba mthung du la rgyas pa/ ral gri 'dzin pa/ gser gyi mdog can dang / sgrub pa pa'o// ras des 'di'i rdzog

261b2(rgyud): 'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems so// gang 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa de dang / 'di'i khyad par yang rtswa dang ri rab kyi khyad par lta bur 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu thabs dang ldan pa'i chog

313b1(rgyud): bsgyur ba rnams la nad lngas gcod pa 'am/ rang gdamag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi dpag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa'am/ gza' nyi ma'i

313b3(rgyud): ra ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ brtson du bzung ba rnams btang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smin gyi zla ba
313b4(rgyud): 'i 'od de la de lta bur mchod pa byas na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das dedang ni na gshegs pa sman gyi dra bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon
313b5(rgyud): na lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang tshar dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa
313b6(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro// yul dang gnad sbyin dang / sbyin pa dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtsa bar me la// l+h+wam ngan/

313b8(rgyud): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' skyab ma grol la 'di skad ces smras so// gas rtse bu ji ltar na tse yongs su zad dam ying mngod par skye/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
314a1(rgyud): / skyabs grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chab dgu yod par khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las mthos sam/ 
314a2(rgyud): sman gyi spyod pa rnams bstan to// sems can nad kyis btab la de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sran de sman ma yin pa byed pa yang yod de/

314a7(rgyud): yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkris pa dang skom pas rten te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// mdod na 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dus ma yin par 'cha
314a8(rgyud): por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba na grangs med dpag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnon spyan gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpor
314b1(rgyud): na po ji 'jigs dang / gnad sbyin gyi snang pan chen po rdo rje dang / gan da sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzan dang / gno sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnodas na/ 
314b2(rgyud): dpor chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / non sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin
314b3(rgyud): mchen po sgo 'dzi dang / gnod sbyin gyi snying po tshon pa bas ma 'dzin dang / gni sbyin sded pan chen po gam pa 'dzin dang / nod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gno sa rgya
314b4(rgyud): pon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la yang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ 
314b5(rgyud): dri skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas khyi mthum bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po sman gyi tha bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror mche ba'i
314b6(rgyud): jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de pan bdag cag snyan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su ma che'o// chos la rlabs su mchi// dge 'dun pa stabs sumachi /

314b8(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi pra bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mtshad pa dang / rim grob byed pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag glesrung babakyi/ yongs su pa srung ba bkye/ gnod pa thams cad
315a1(rgyud): lam yongs su thar par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la legs sog
315a2(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/ sems can thams cad
315a3(rgyud): la phar pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
315a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar ga

315a8(rgyud): drab sems dpa' de dag dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi ngas
315b1(rgyud): bcom ldan las kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sun gyi zab cur+yar 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'amado sngags s+ho// 
315b2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi t+ya dang / dA na shI la dang / suM chen gyi le rgya ba brje ye shes sde la sogs pas bskur cing zhus/ skad gas brgyad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 
315b3(rgyud): Ar+ya ta thA ga ta bai nur+ya pra b+hi nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+hi d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'iri ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i

315b5(rgyud): drub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi shing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu stong
315b6(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yas so// lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma dang / me tog gi char dpag ta med pa bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas
315b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i sang go'i khrel bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dbang thams cad kyis ni bskor/ lha dang klu dang
315b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur nga / 
316a1(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan pas langs te/ thal mo sbyar na sa 'di skad ces g.yob to// thams cad dgongs su gsol// sems ca
316a2(rgyud): rnarnams kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / ra ba thams cad bskad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi

317b7(rgyud): byung bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis me btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tshe bar 'thur / dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams cad las yongs su dang per 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dkon pa'i
317b8(rgyud): gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed 'thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//

318a3(rgyud): mas cad dam par 'thag cing rtsod pa zhes bya ba yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshag pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa
318a4(rgyud): pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yod rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs te/

318a7(rgyud): skad du/ A d+ya ba ShA na ci bul ba mAn/ su pra teSh+Tha ta gu h+ya par la ro he s+yan ka lpa/ rA dz+nyA na ma d+hA ra NAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhalas khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsangahA/ 
318a8(rgyud): pad ma re gsang pa'i cho ga zhib mo 'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i
318b1(rgyud): tsho grob kyi che pang 'dus pa dang pol bdud bya ba phar par mdzad/ dbang pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / datsang bu pa thams cad dang / mu sngags can gzhan rnams kyang brtum nas pham par mdzad de/ 
318b2(rgyud): khor ba'i spyod 'khor ba'i dre ba'i pha rol tu gshegs so// gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrog brgyad stong phrag du ma g.yog 'dud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag zhes 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/ 
318b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis mardo rjer byid gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yabang thos shang mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su 'ang par
318b4(rgyud): kur ro// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mda'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma 'dab ma stong pa
318b5(rgyud): srid na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug pa 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad ma dbyung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du snang bar byas so// de nas pad ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i
318b6(rgyud): gzungs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo // phyogs bcu ni bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma Ni badz+ra hr-id ya/ badz+ra pA ra se n+ya bi dra ba Ni/ ha na ha na/ 
318b7(rgyud): 'adz+ra gar+b+he/ d+hU pa ya trA sa ya/ sarba mA ra b+hu ba ni ni pU Sh+TaM/ se d+ha ra ba d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha/ mad+hi marba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ka wa a rme he swA hA/ pad ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag sde// des skyong gsum
318b8(rgyud): ngachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nam/ shAkya thub pa sred pa'i dgon pa las ni rga la/ bdud ni btsam// nyon mongs pa'i rdu ba ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo 'i kAb sa ni dra ga chos
319a1(rgyud): kyi skyon ma chen po ni sbar te/ gang ga phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud ni bcom pa lags so legs so// de ram gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan// 
319a2(rgyud): rnga rnga snga zeng zhes byed cing lus 'dra nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtigs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad sreg zo sto bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rig sngags chen po
319a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar mthos lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag
319a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag ni rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyang pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po
319a5(rgyud): jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di yang me tog sna tshags su gyur te bab po// gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags

325a5(rgyud): da po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba dar song ste phyin nam/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur
325a6(rgyud): sa te spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i sa
325a7(rgyud): med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'di/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
325a8(rgyud): sol ba btab par thugs su chud nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pi'i bdag po sang la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyis phyogs su rdo rjes sil bcu
325b1(rgyud): danapa gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te sa la
325b2(rgyud): spun ma thag tu de nas chu bzhi gas so// skyong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang na drug tu rab tu g.yos so// g.yos ma thag tu 'phyogs derang rin po che sde bdun gyi khang
325b3(rgyud): rtseg ma gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi pa zur bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ chos mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na thug pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ them sa
325b4(rgyud): bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod la/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo // khang pa brtseg ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / 
325b5(rgyud): dang / mu tig ge dra ba du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma dpyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog
325b6(rgyud): na po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo // mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsag
325b7(rgyud): de dag la mchod pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang khang pa brtseg ma de dang mchod rten la mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa de dang
325b8(rgyud): dugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pa dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
326a1(rgyud): lto phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes de ya ma ngan du gyur/ spro ba dkur nas khang pa brtsed ma dang / mchod rten 'di
326a2(rgyud): dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang / thal mo sbyar nas
326a3(rgyud): khod de phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas khang pa brtsegs de las sgra byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag par snang la ci snang ltos shig ltos shig/ de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag 'ams
326a4(rgyud): nad kyis par snang la bltas te bltas ma thag tu bai ru r+ya dang / nar du rini nga na chen po la byung 'i snyen gyi phung po nige byung ngo // de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gnas med 'ang
326a5(rgyud): du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris par mthong ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byung ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nong bu
326a6(rgyud): chen ba rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs pa khrag tu gas la ba klag tu gsol// sgra byung ma theg tu de bzhin gshegs par ri'i spyan sngar snyen gyi phung po
326a7(rgyud): las bris pa byung nas 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so// bcom ldan 'das
326b1(rgyud): bus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi bu bzhugs te/ de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di sang shing de kha na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdzu 'phru rnam
326b2(rgyud): par 'phrul pa yang snang / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang brtsa
326b3(rgyud): tha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro// de nas phyog sa bcu nas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
326b4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so//

326b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po la khang pa brtseg ma'i mchod rten gang na bar bzhud de/ phyag g.yas paka 'ad gyi kha dog can/ bod na
326b7(rgyud): t+ya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang nas mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo'i phar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to// nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhid gshegs pa
326b8(rgyud): kra thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khar la lan gnyis pa bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i
327a1(rgyud): // nyid la bzhugs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327a2(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtseg ma'i mchod rten gyin du mi ci'i slad du byung gang nas gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das
327a3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gzhal tu med pa/ gzhal gyis mi khang pa/ tshad gzung du med pa/ ches grangs
327a4(rgyud): / med pa na gang gi tshe 'jam bu'i gling 'byor pa/ rgyas pa dang / lo lags pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang zhing ma mos pam btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/ bdag gi med
327a5(rgyud): cing yongs su bzung ba med de/ 'jig rten thams cad bde bar ldan pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do// de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig
327a6(rgyud): gnas te/ gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/ gnyis pa ni gser gyi gtsug tor/ gsum pa ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bsgral
327a7(rgyud): phyi 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur snyam zhing gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/ chos yid la byed/ dge 'dun yid
327a8(rgyud): byed do// de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cing mi smra bar gyur cing sems pa na/ de rnams kyis sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa/ rnam par ba
327b1(rgyud): ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / lha'i mig skyes nas ji tsam na steng du bltas na/ gnam gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bar snang la sgra 'byin pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so ler+tha
327b2(rgyud): so// khyod 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'od ni legs so// kye skyes bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gnal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa
327b3(rgyud): gsang ba sdod byed bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
327b4(rgyud): bar thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi sgron ma sbar bar 'gyur/ dge ba'irtsa
327b5(rgyud): ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin po drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kye yul dang / lha ma yin gyi

327b7(rgyud): dar bar 'gyur ba thos sam phyi ma'i tshe bye ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang / yang mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /

328a1(rgyud): // dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / bram ze gsad pa dang / nga lang gsad pa dang / tsham rkun byed pa dang / g.yon can dang / sha gam skugs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / ma bya du/

330a5(rgyud): du bzang po rnam par bkrang rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes byang rim gro par gyur pa na/ de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to// de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tham
330a6(rgyud): cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thung pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin to// shAkya zhub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin brlabs 'di 'dra bas ldan gyi spyod 'gasung
330a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ de bzhin gsheg

330b1(rgyud): shegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phar

330b3(rgyud): sang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od

330b7(rgyud): shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
330b8(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang dmir pa dang dkar po dang le bzhin dang shel dang / dngul gyi bdag dgapa kye ste/ de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su
331a1(rgyud): rnams su dang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
331a2(rgyud): byas nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so// 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen pos bkang nas rig sngags chen mo 'di gsungs
331a3(rgyud): so// oM sarba ta thA gA tA ma Na sha ta dip+ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gan+d+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngag+sas kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs mtha
331a4(rgyud): ra dang / tshal dang / nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu tu g.yas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so nas bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu
331a5(rgyud): gsang ba 'di gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil

331a8(rgyud): dzes chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / yid 'ong ba dang / par sha ka dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab bo// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu 'bar bar

332a1(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed do// dpal sum chen mo dang / lha mo chen ma dbyangs can ma dang / lha mchen po dung can ma dang / gnod sbyin mo tshan

336b8(rgyud): ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te parnam brjod 'ayum byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi btso bor 'gyur/ gang 'dod pa dpyod par 'du du ci thams cad yin byed mtshor

344a3(rgyud): mchog tu brnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lags so// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub
344a4(rgyud): pa pa legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ rang rlung gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang / 
344a5(rgyud): dzu phrul kyi tshor phul chen pos mim 'jig rten rje khams su gshegs so// 'phags pa narang bu chen rgyam pa'i gnas me yang shin tu rag
344a6(rgyud): nas pa gsang bdam pa'i gas pa'i chog gi na ste bdun pa rdzogs sos+ho// / rgyan mkhan
344a7(rgyud): b+hadang /  nu pa parje dpal gyi spun po bskur shing /
